item.title: All About Wipro SIM Program | Detailed Review And Reality!
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Wipro SIM Program - School For IT Infrastructure Management Program (SIM) is an exclusive recruitment program that offers students an opportunity to upgrade their diploma in Computer Science, IT, EC, Electrical and Electronics, or Telecommunication to a B.Tech degree in Information Systems. This program is open to graduates who have a diploma with 60% or above marks. Students with a diploma in Computer Science / Information Technology / Electronics / Telecommunication / Computer Engineering / Electronics and Communication / Computer Technology / Computer Science and Technology / Electrical and Electronics Engineering are eligible for the program.

About WIPRO

Wipro is a leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company that provides end-to-end solutions to clients worldwide. The company has a strong presence in India, with a workforce of over 200,000 employees. The SIM program is one of the many initiatives taken by Wipro to attract top talent and provide them with opportunities to grow and develop.

Benefits Of WIPRO SIM Program

One of the key benefits of the SIM program is that it offers full sponsorship for the B.Tech degree. Students who are selected for the program will be able to pursue their degree from an Institute of Eminence (IoE)-ranked university. This is a significant benefit, as it means that the degree will be of high quality and recognized by employers worldwide.

Another benefit of the program is that students will be able to start their career with Wipro. As a Scholar Trainee, students will receive a stipend during their training period. The stipend will increase every year, providing an incentive for students to complete the program. In addition to the stipend, students will also receive medical and insurance benefits, retirement benefits, and loans for housing and vehicles.

Official Link Of WIPRO SIM Program

Drawbacks Of WIPRO SIM Program

However, it should be noted that the salary offered by Wipro during the training period is relatively low compared to the industry standards. Students will receive a monthly stipend of INR 12,400 in the first year, INR 15,488 in the second year, INR 17,553 in the third year, and INR 19,618 in the fourth year. While this may be sufficient to cover basic expenses, it may not be enough for students who have other financial commitments.

Moreover, the B.Tech degree sponsored by Wipro may not be as valuable as a degree obtained from a reputed university through a regular course. While the degree is recognized by employers, it may not carry the same weightage as a degree obtained through a regular course. This could impact students' career prospects in the long run.

Conclusion Of WIPRO SIM Program

In conclusion, the Wipro SIM program offers students a unique opportunity to upgrade their diploma to a B.Tech degree while receiving full sponsorship and a stipend. However, students should be aware that the salary offered during the training period is relatively low, and the degree obtained through the program may not carry the same weightage as a regular degree. Nevertheless, the program is an excellent opportunity for students who are looking to start their career in the IT industry and gain valuable experience.

Then What Is My Next Option ?

It is important for students to make informed decisions about their education and career paths. While programs like Wipro's School For IT Infrastructure Management Program can seem attractive due to the promise of a fully sponsored degree and a headstart in one's career, it is important to carefully consider the potential drawbacks and alternatives.

One alternative to this program is to pursue a lateral entry into a college or university after completing a diploma in computer science, information technology, electronics, or a related field. This allows students to complete a full Bachelor of Engineering or Bachelor of Technology degree, rather than just an information systems degree, which may provide more opportunities and higher earning potential in the long run.

It is important to note that the salary offered through the SIM program may be significantly lower than what a graduate with a full BE or Btech degree could earn in the same field. While the stipend offered in the SIM program increases each year, the final salary of INR 19,618 per month may be considered low for someone with a Bachelor's degree in a technical field. Graduates with a full degree may have more negotiating power when it comes to starting salaries and career advancement opportunities.

Is BTECH Degree Is Valid?

While the SIM program offers a degree from an Institute of Eminence-ranked university, it is important to consider the value of the degree beyond the sponsored program. While the degree may be valid, it may not hold the same weight as a degree earned through a full-time program at a reputable university. It is important for students to research the reputation of the university and the specific program they will be enrolled in before committing to the SIM program or any other sponsored degree program.

Ultimately, the choice between the SIM program and pursuing a full degree through a lateral entry program or regular college is up to the individual student. It is important to carefully consider one's long-term goals and weigh the potential benefits and drawbacks of each option before making a decision.

RECENT JOBS

item.title: Say No To TCS NQT | Don't Apply For This Exam
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Say No To TCS NQT - The TCS National Qualifier Test (NQT) is an exam conducted by Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) to assess the cognitive abilities of candidates and their suitability for various roles within the organization. While it is true that BCA and BSc students may have limited career options within TCS, it is not necessarily the case that the exam is of no use to them.

Note : Examining All The Pros and Cons of TCS NQT for BCA and BSc Graduates Only This Information Not Belongs To An Engineering Student

WHY? Say No To TCS NQT
1. Very Less Salary

While it is true that the starting salary for BCA and BSc graduates may be lower than that of BE/BTech graduates, the exact salary can vary depending on various factors such as the location, industry, job role, and the company's pay structure. It is possible that some BCA and BSc graduates working at TCS Through NQT earning only 12,000 Per Month, If Your Friend Claiming More Than This Ask Them To Show Salary Slip.

It is not appropriate to ask someone to show their pay slip as it is personal and confidential information. However, it is always a good practice to do thorough research and gather information about the company and the job role before accepting any job offer to ensure that it meets your expectations and career goals.

2. Cost Of The Exam

While it is true that the TCS NQT exam is a paid exam, it is important to note that the exam pack includes the cognitive skills, But You Have to Purchase Any Combo Pack For Silly JOB, While it is possible to purchase other combo packs, it is not mandatory to do so to secure a job. Additionally, the cost of the exam pack is Not reasonable compared to other similar exams in the industry.

It is important to understand that the TCS NQT exam is not a guarantee of a job, but it is a good opportunity to showcase your skills and potentially land an interview with TCS or other partner companies. Candidates should carefully evaluate the cost and benefits of the exam and make an informed decision based on their career goals and expectations.

3. Offline Exam

It is true that the TCS NQT exam is conducted in offline mode, and candidates are required to travel to the designated TCS ion centers to take the exam. While this may be an inconvenience for some candidates, offline exams are a common practice in the industry but Almost They Schedule Exams After 3 PM Which Cause inconvenient for some candidates, and TCS should consider offering more flexible exam timings to accommodate the needs of all candidates.

However, TCS should also ensure that the exam centers are easily accessible and safe for all candidates, especially For Ladies. Because exams get over after 6 Pm They may face problems while returning home.

4. No Two Years Scorecard Validity

It is important to note that while the TCS NQT scorecard may not guarantee a job offer, it can be a valuable credential to include on a resume and can improve a candidate's chances of getting hired. But TCS NQT Claims that their scorecard valid for 2 years but until now no one hired after year of exams from BCA And BSC Streams.

5. Exam frequency

The TCS NQT is conducted multiple times a year to provide candidates with more opportunities to take the exam and improve their scores.But If their scorecard is valid for 2 years then why they are conducting exams within 3 months from last 3 years, and their other hirings like Ninja, Digital, Ingite, Xplore, Sigma Have Minimum 6 Months Of Cooling Period.

6. Non-IT roles

TCS will offer non-IT roles to BCA and BSC candidates, this is not necessarily a drawback. Non-IT roles can also provide valuable experience and opportunities for growth, but if you had a dream to pursue your career in IT Domain, Development And Testing This Is Conflict.

Apply Now

item.title: Tata Steel Hiring Interns 2023 | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Tata Steel Hiring Interns 2023 | Tata Steel Downstream Products Limited (TSDPL) Hiring Students From Various Education Streams Across The Country

Tata Steel Hiring Interns 2023 ( TSDPL )
About Tata Steel Internship ( TSDPL )

Tata Steel Downstream Products Limited (TSDPL) is dedicated to providing valuable opportunities to students from prestigious Business Schools and Engineering Institutes across the country by inviting them to participate in its Internship Projects. These internships typically last between 8 to 12 weeks, and TSDPL recognizes the significance of internships as a means for students to gain hands-on experience and practical skills.

TSDPL's commitment to nurturing young talent goes beyond just providing students with real-world project work. The company also emphasises the importance of learning and skill development that will benefit students in their future careers. To that end, TSDPL offers a comprehensive learning experience, including mentorship, exposure to various functions, and networking opportunities.

Learn While You Work At TATA Steel ( TSDPL )

At TSDPL, we understand the value of practical experience when it comes to learning. That's why we have created an internship program that offers students the opportunity to engage in field experience and gain on-the-job learning.

During their internship, students get to explore the connections between their academic knowledge and the industrial and corporate exposure they receive while working with us. This allows them to gain invaluable insights that can only be learned through real-world experience.

But our internship program isn't just about learning from us. We also encourage our interns to share their knowledge and insights with us. By giving them the freedom to offer innovative solutions and suggestions, we believe that our interns can make meaningful contributions to our organization.

In short, our internship program at TSDPL is designed to provide students with the opportunity to learn while they work. By engaging in field experience and sharing their knowledge with us, our interns gain valuable insights and contribute to our organization's growth and development.

How To Apply For Internship At TSDPL

If you are interested in applying for an internship at TSDPL, there are several options available to you. We welcome applications from a variety of Institutes and organizations, and we carefully evaluate each candidate's abilities, mobility, and our organizational requirements to determine if they are a good fit.

Our selection process begins with an initial round of screening, after which we offer projects to candidates who meet our criteria. We believe in providing our interns with meaningful, real-world experiences that will help them grow both personally and professionally.

If you are interested in applying for an internship at TSDPL, you can do so directly through our website. Our online application process is designed to be simple and straightforward, allowing interested students to submit their applications quickly and easily. if you are interested in pursuing an internship at TSDPL, we encourage you to explore your options and apply today. Whether you choose to apply through your Institute or directly online, we look forward to considering your application and providing you with a valuable learning experience.

Wipro Hiring Freshers 2023
About The Role

The purpose of this role is to the first point of contact for theB2B users who call Wipro Service Desk to troubleshoot appropriate enduser issues in line with Wipro’s Service Desk objectives

What You Will Do
  • Be responsible for primary user support and customer serviceBe responsible for primary user support and customer service
    • Respond to queries from all calls, portal, emails, chats fromthe client
    • Become familiar with each client and their respectiveapplications/ processes
    • Learn fundamental operations of commonly-used software, hardwareand other equipment
    • Follow standard service desk operating procedures by accuratelylogging all service desk tickets using the defined tracking software
    • Ensure that the scorecard is maintained as per SoW with respectto TAT, SLA & hits
    • Manage all queries or escalate if not resolve as per the definedhelpdesk policies and framework
  • Regular MIS & resolution log management on queriesraised 
    • Record events and problems and their resolution in logs
    • Follow-up and update customer status and information
    • Pass on any feedback, suggestions, escalations by customers tothe appropriate internal team

Responsibilities
  • Refers to the duties and tasks assigned to an individual as part of their employment.
  • The act of engaging with individuals or groups who have an interest or concern in a particular project or organization.
  • Refers to the classification of stakeholders based on their relationship or interest in the project or organization.
  • The process of identifying and categorizing stakeholders who may be affected by or have an interest in a project or organization.
  • Refers to the reason or objective behind engaging with stakeholders, such as providing updates, addressing concerns, or seeking input.
  • Refers to stakeholders who are part of the same organization as the individual or team, such as team leads or core service delivery teams.
  • An internal stakeholder responsible for managing a team of service desk agents and ensuring adherence to the service desk statement of work (SoW).
  • The purpose of interaction with the team lead, involving the provision of regular progress updates and reports on service desk operations.
  • An internal stakeholder responsible for the delivery of core services and ensuring adherence to the service desk SoW.
  • The purpose of interaction with the core service delivery team, involving the monitoring and enforcement of adherence to the service desk SoW.
  • Refers to stakeholders who are not part of the organization, such as clients or customers.
  • External stakeholders who use the services or products provided by the organization, requiring assistance with issues or queries.
  • The purpose of interaction with clients, involving the handling of their issues or queries related to the organization's services or products.
Skills
  • The ability to convey information clearly and effectively to others.
  • The ability to pay close attention to details and ensure accuracy in work.
  • The ability to adapt and respond to changes in the work environment.
  • A focus on meeting the needs and expectations of clients or customers.
  • The ability to deliver high-quality results and meet objectives efficiently.
  • A drive to achieve and exceed goals, with a focus on delivering successful outcomes.

item.content:encoded:
HSBC Hiring Freshers 2023 From Graduate BA,BCA, BE or BTech For The System Administrator Role | All The Important Details Given Below

HSBC Hiring Freshers 2023 Details
About HSBC

At HSBC, we prioritize the well-being of our employees and candidates, particularly in light of the ongoing Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) situation. To ensure that we can continue to attract top talent, we are leveraging digital technologies and may ask candidates to use our video-interviewing tools as part of the recruitment process. Our Resourcing team will provide guidance on how to use these tools and answer any questions that may arise.

HSBC is a global leader in banking and financial services, operating in over 64 countries and territories with a focus on enabling businesses to grow and economies to prosper. We offer a range of opportunities, support, and rewards to help our employees reach their full potential and pursue their career goals.

We are currently seeking a skilled professional to join our team in the capacity of a Systems Administrator.

Job Profile
  • Incident Monitoring
  • Resolving Complex tickets and those escalated from Level 2
  • Incident Registration utilizing Global Service Desk
  • Root cause analysis and resolution
  • Proactive problem management
  • Coordination with other support groups and vendors
  • Installation & configuration
  • Installation of Fix packs and Addons
  • Upgrading the existing environment to the recommended Version
  • Migration of existing packages and configurations to the new environment
  • Server Installation & Upgrade
  • Creation and configuration of Datastage Projects and configurations files
  • Scheduling Maintenance jobs
  • Reports performance & tuning
  • Query performance
  • Audit findings & actions
  • Creating users, granting / revoking user and/or group privileges, resetting passwords
  • Implementing Security standards
  • Verify schedule jobs and its logs/ analyse reports for tasks like continuous Report failures, Badly Scheduled Reports, Long Executing Reports and Queries, Reports executed from personal folders.
  • Reactive monitoring using various tools and report the bottlenecks
  • Proactive monitoring and Reporting the worst performing reports & queries as potential candidates for improvement
  • Publishing & Package Migration
  • Review implement and publish Cognos Framework Model, BO Universe and Datastage to the respective Environment
  • Migrating Cognos packages and Datastage from one Environment to another(i.e. from Dev to UAT and then to Production)
  • Ensuring Cognos and Datastage Packages are protected and monitored by establishing backup and recovery procedures, providing a secure reporting environment, and monitoring their performance
  • Automation of Tasks
  • Preparing and maintaining housekeeping and maintenance scripts
  • Collecting Performance metrics
  • Analysis of the Metrics collected
  • Report Development and Scheduling Jobs
  • Building Cognos Cubes and schedule them
  • Troubleshooting errors reported by the Cognos developer community.
  • Designing backup/restore policy in collaboration with application teams.
  • Best Practice Documents
  • Raising problem records with vendors and follow ups
  • DR set up and testing
Requirements
  • Graduate (BA,BCA, BE or BTech)
  • Cognos Framework Model, BO Universe and Datastage to the respective Environment

Wipro WILP 2023 scheduled to hire B.Sc/BCA 2021,2022 & 2023 batch graduates. The detailed eligibility and application process for Wipro WILP 2023 will be given below.

Wipro WILP 2023 Details
Detailed Eligibility
  • Bachelor of Computer Application – BCA
  • Bachelor of Science -B.Sc. Eligible Streams – Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics, Electronics and Physics
  • Year of Passing: 2021,2022,2023 ONLY
  • 10th Standard: Pass
  • 12th Standard: Pass
  • Graduation: 60% or 6.0 CGPA above as applicable by the university guidelines.

Stipend details

  • 1st Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 15,000 + 488 (ESI) + Joining Bonus of Rs.75,000 along with the 1st month Stipend.
  • 2nd Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 17,000 + 533 (ESI)
  • 3rd Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 19,000 + 618 (ESI)
  • 4th Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 23,000
Other Criteria
  • Open school or distance education is allowed for 10th & 12th only
  • One Backlog is allowed at the time of Online Assessment
  • Candidates are expected to clear the backlogs along with the 6th semester.
  • Mandatory to have studied Core Mathematics as one subject in Graduation.
  • Business Maths & Applied Maths will NOT be considered as Core Mathematics in Graduation.
  • Max 3 years of GAP in education allowed (between 10th to commencement of graduation)
  • No Gaps are allowed in Graduation. Graduation should be completed within 3 years from the start of graduation.
  • Should be an Indian Citizen or should hold a PIO or OCI card, in the event of holding a passport of any other country.
  • Bhutan and Nepal Nationals need to submit their citizenship certificate.
  • Candidates will be invited for the test process, who have completed 3 months cool-off period

Must have completed or should be a final year student of B.E. /B.Tech. / B.Sc. (Engg.) in the following specified discipline.

  • Civil & Structural
  • Ceramic
  • Chemical
  • Electrical/ Electronics/ Instrumentation/Power Electronics

  • Mechanical
  • Metallurgy
  • Mineral
  • Mining

  • Production Engineering
  • Industrial Engineering

(OR)

  • Geology
  • Geophysics
  • Remote Sensing
  • GIS

  • Candidates who have completed three year diploma and directly joined 2nd year of engineering and are in the final year of BE/ B Tech / B Sc (Engg) are also eligible

Age Limit(As on 1 June 2023)

  • For General Candidates: Should not be more than 30 years
  • For Transgender, PwD , SC/ST Candidates : Should not be more than 32 years

Emoluments

  • Engineer Trainee will be offered an all-inclusive Stipend of ₹ 30,000 per month during the period of 1 Year Training.

Selection Process

  • Eligible candidates will undergo an online Cognitive and Technical Test
  • Shortlisted candidates will be invited for interviews either in person or on a virtual medium

Aspiring Engineers Program 2023-Program Details

  • Selected Candidates will be placed as Engineer Trainee for a duration of 1 year
    The trainees will be subject to evaluations on regular basis during the training period.
  • On successful completion of training, they will be considered for Fixed Term Employment of Three (3) years as Assistant Manager (IL6) at Tata Steel.

item.content:encoded:
Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 Is Scheduled To Hire 2022 And 2023 Batch Students From BE BTech ME MTech MCA And MSC Streams With Full Time Education All The Detailed Eligibility And Process Given Below.

Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 Details

JOB DESCRIPTION

Associate Software Engineer (ASE)

About Accenture
Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services-all powered by the world's largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 624,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners, and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Role Overview
Join our team that is developing, designing and maintaining technologies that improve the way our clients and the world works. Working in challenging and dynamic environments, using their versatility to create and support technology solutions that meet client requirements from analysis to implementation

What would you do? 

As an Associate Software Engineer you would largely be involved in:

  • Design, build, test, assemble, support and configure application using business requirements
  • Understand business drivers that will impact performance and deliver software to those expectations
  • Bake technology trends into solutions; Participate in the development of automation solutions, new functionality and technologies and integrate them in existing solutions
  • Responsible for incident resolution and support extended to customers through voice interaction/email/chat/remote support

What we need?

We would love you to have:

  • Ability to anticipate and resolve business issues with agility
  • Multi-disciplinary and versatile with the aptitude to learn and apply new skills faster
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills and proficient in verbal and communication skills
  • Deliver code, to time and quality expectations and participate in peer reviews
  • Take ownership of the successful implementation of the solution
  • Support infrastructure operations and /or manage delivery for IT production system and services
  • Flexibility to relocate for project deployment to any part of India and work in 24X7 shifts basis business requirement

Also, the below mentioned will be preferred

  • Basic understanding of ABAP Development on HANA, CDS, AMDP, Performance Analysis
  • Experience or knowledge in configuration, customization of Salesforce.com applications
  • Good working knowledge in J2EE and full-stack development
  • Knowledge and development experience of .NET (ASP.NET/ASP.NET MVC)

Test automation engineering

  • Creation of test designs, test processes, test cases and test data
  • Apply business and functional knowledge including testing standards, guidelines, and testing methodology to meet the teams overall test objectives
  • Responsible for designing testing scenarios for usability testing
  • Prepare all reports related to software testing carried out
  • Analyze the results and then submit the observations to the development team

Eligibility Criteria

  • All streams/branches of B.E/B.Tech/M.E/M.Tech, MCA, and M.Sc. (CSE, IT only) from 2022 & 2023 year of pass outs with full-time education only (Part-time and distance educations are not considered)

Note: MBA /PGDBM candidates are not eligible to apply for this role

  • No active backlogs during application and/or during onboarding.
  • You should have completed your relevant degree (eligible for this job role), in the stipulated duration of the degree. Hence, there should be no gaps during the course of your degree.

 Eg: You must complete your B.Tech in 4 years or M.Tech/MSc in 2 years.

  • Your highest educational qualification only will be considered
  • Candidate should not have appeared for Accenture Recruitment assessment/interview process in the last three months.
  • Candidate should not have more than 11 months of experience
  • Candidates must be eligible to work in India either by citizenship/ have relevant work permit documents.
  • Please note that Bhutan and Nepal nationals can work in India without a need for obtaining a work visa. All other foreign nationals require work visa or an Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI) or Person of Indian Origin (PIO) card to work in India
  • You are willing to work in any Business Unit/Service line within the company
  • You are willing to join /relocate to any Accenture office across India

Apply Now

item.title: Wipro Bulk Hiring Drive 2023 | Across India | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Wipro Bulk Hiring Drive 2023 for Trainee for B.E/B.Tech/MCA-2023 Batch & Diploma/B.Sc/BCA  –  2021/2022/2023 batch for Multiple Roles. The detailed eligibility and application process are given in  below.

Wipro Off Campus Drive 2023 for Trainee
Detailed Eligibility Wipro Bulk Hiring Drive 2023
  • B.Tech / BE (CS, IT and ECE) / MCA only.
  • 2023 passout only.
Quality and Technical Skills
  • Knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) principles/concepts.
  • Principles of automation testing and some exposure might be desirable.
  • Knowledge of system testing and software quality assurance best practices and methodologies.
  • Ability to break down a complex problem into smaller, more manageable pieces and able to understand and describe the relationships between those pieces (i.e. good analytical skills).
  • Apply basic relational database concepts (e.g. table relationships, keys, SQL and DB2 queries etc).
  • Experience with systems implementations
  • Writes intermediate SQL queries
  • Troubleshoots intermediate system defects and errors
  • Effectively manage tasks, prioritizes and proactively update status to Managers.
  • Should be able to tie test plans to real time customer impact
  • Should be able to think test cases beyond the test plan provided
  • Strong ability and keenness to break the system through testing
  • Good Understanding of Data Analysis
  • Analyzes and debug issues
  • Utilizes relevant problem-solving resources as needed
  • Escalates issues when appropriate.
Roles & Responsibilities
  • Client Knowledge and Delivery
  • Reviews client requirements documents and any preliminary test plans, rightly adhere to the due dates and support the client delivery priority.
  • Asks clarifying questions on the stated requirements, and effectively use the handoff time.
  • Utilizes relevant problem-solving resources as needed.
  • Escalates issues when appropriate.
  • Uses typical client requirements documentation to assist with analysis and/or test planning.
  • Identifies needed test cases
  • Completes test plans with test case needs
  • Configures the system to meet analysis specifications.
  • Documents relevant configuration in analysis specifications.
  • Fixes any issues identified via test execution
  • Ability to stress test the system

Apply Now

Wipro Off Campus Drive 2023 for Wipro SIM (School of IT Infrastructure Management):

Detailed Eligibility

  • Diploma in Computer Science/ Information Technology/ Electronics/ Telecommunication: 60% and above

Year of Passing: 2021, 2022, 2023

10th Standard: 50% or above
12th Standard: 50% or above

Compensation per annum

  • First-year stipend: INR 12,400 per month
  • Second-year stipend: INR 15,488 per month
  • Third-year stipend: INR 17,553 per month
  • Fourth-year stipend: INR 19,618 per month

Service Agreement

The agreement period is of 48 months from the date of joining. The candidate will be liable to pay a sum of INR 75,000 on a pro-rata basis if he/she leaves the organization before the completion of 48 months for breaching the service agreement.

Additional criteria
  • Maximum of 3 years of education gap, if any, is allowed between 10th and graduation.
  • No gaps are allowed during graduation. The degree should be completed within 3 years from the start of the course.
  • Education should be regular full-time in 10th, 12th & graduation recognized by the Central/State Government of India.
  • Candidates with part-time, correspondence or distance learning in either 10th or 12th or graduation are not eligible.
  • Maximum of one backlog till the assessment process is allowed. The offer will be subject to all backlogs being cleared at the time of offer.
  • Should be an Indian Citizen or should hold a PIO or OCI card in the event of holding a passport of any other country.
  • Bhutan and Nepal Nationals need to submit their citizenship certificate.
  • Candidates who have participated in any selection process held by Wipro in the last three months are not eligible.

Apply Now

Wipro Work Integrated Learning Program 2023 (Wipro WILP – 2023)
Detailed Eligibility
  • Bachelor of Computer Application – BCA
  • Bachelor of Science -B.Sc. Eligible Streams – Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics, Electronics and Physics
  • Year of Passing: 2021,2022,2023 ONLY
  • 10th Standard: Pass
  • 12th Standard: Pass
  • Graduation: 60% or 6.0 CGPA above as applicable by the university guidelines.

Stipend details

  • 1st Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 15,000 + 488 (ESI) + Joining Bonus of Rs.75,000 along with the 1st month Stipend.
  • 2nd Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 17,000 + 533 (ESI) 
  • 3rd Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 19,000 + 618 (ESI)
  • 4th Year: You will receive a stipend of INR 23,000
Other Criteria
  • Open school or distance education is allowed for 10th & 12th only
  • One Backlog is allowed at the time of Online Assessment
  • Candidates are expected to clear the backlogs along with the 6th semester.
  • Mandatory to have studied Core Mathematics as one subject in Graduation.
  • Business Maths & Applied Maths will NOT be considered as Core Mathematics in Graduation.
  • Max 3 years of GAP in education allowed (between 10th to commencement of graduation)
  • No Gaps are allowed in Graduation. Graduation should be completed within 3 years from the start of graduation.
  • Should be an Indian Citizen or should hold a PIO or OCI card, in the event of holding a passport of any other country.
  • Bhutan and Nepal Nationals need to submit their citizenship certificate.
  • Candidates will be invited for the test process, who have completed 3 months cool-off period

Apply Now

item.title: Deloitte Off Campus Drive 2023 | Multiple Roles | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Deloitte Off Campus Drive 2023 – Deloitte scheduled to hire  Development Analyst,Business Solution Analyst – BA/QA,Systems Analyst for B.E/B.Tech/MCA  graduates at Hyderabad. The detailed eligibility and application process are given below.

Deloitte Off Campus Drive 2023

Detailed Profile:

Eligible Degrees and Branches

  • B.E/B.Tech/ M.C.A. (60% or 6.5 GPA and above throughout without any running backlogs)
  • Excellent analytical skills and communication skills (written, verbal, and presentation)
  • Ability to chart ones’ own career and build networks within the organization
  • Ability to work both independently and as part of a team with professionals at all levels
  • Ability to prioritize tasks, work on multiple assignments, and raise concerns/questions where appropriate
  • Suggest practical solutions and collaborate with the customer to implement the solutions
  • Perform account coordination with the customer to build / improve relationship, seek feedback to identify areas of improvement
  • Seek information / ideas / establish relationship with customer to assess any future opportunities
  • Define project standards, knowledge of methodologies, and understanding of process improvement initiatives
  • Interact with functional SMEs

Job Description

1. Role : Development Analyst

As a Development Analyst, you will be responsible for designing and developing software applications for ITS Canada enterprise. Your key responsibilities will include:

  • Designing, building, Unit Testing and documenting applications using Microsoft platform and other technologies including but not limited to C#, ASP.NET, SharePoint, SQL Server, Azure, ServiceNow, Siebel, PeopleSoft, SAP HANA, Hadoop, Data Stage, RPA and Business Intelligence. This list of technologies continues to evolve and grow
  • Working with Senior Development Analysts, Architects, Delivery Managers and Business Analysts to clearly define and understand business requirements
  • Recommending technological solutions/options when required on projects to achieve business objectives.
  • Being an active participant in the Communities of Practice (CoP) and engage in sharing of leading practices and standards

2. Role : Business Solution Analyst – BA/QA

As the (BSA) you will understand, elicit, gather and document requirements for both functional and non-functional aspects of a solution by engaging with various clients and stakeholders. You will execute the required test cases related to one or more solutions. Your key responsibilities will include:

  • Build requirements from ground up or enhance existing requirements by documenting Epics and user stories.
  • Be the bridge between the customer and delivery team
  • Create new test packages (Test Design, Execution Plan and Data Preparations)
  • Test low to medium complexity system applications and analyze all output
  • Report any product defects or non-compliance with business/ functional requirements
  • Support conformance and application of test process management tools process and guideline
  • Be an active participant in the Communities of Practice (CoP)

3. Role : Systems Analyst

As a System Analyst, you will be responsible for maintaining applications, supporting IT Infrastructure, IT Security and End User Support for ITS Canada. Your key responsibilities will include:

  • Deploy, maintain, support applications and IT Infrastructure using Microsoft platform and other technologies including but not limited to SharePoint, SQL Server, Azure, ERP, SCOM,
  • SCCM, SolarWinds, ServiceNow, Virtualization – HyperV/VMWare, Network, Storage, Active Directory, Skype, Exchange, ArcSight, SourceFire etc. This list of technologies continues to evolve and grow
  • Working with Senior Systems Analysts, Development Analysts, Architects, Delivery Managers, Infrastructure Managers to support IT needs
  • Recommending and implementing Infrastructure solutions/options when required on to support business objectives.
  • Being an active participant in the Communities of Practice (CoP) and engage in sharing of leading practices and standards

About Deloitte 

Deloitte refers to one or more of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited, a UK private company limited by guarantee (“DTTL”), its network of member firms, and their related entities. DTTL and each of its member firms are legally separate and independent entities. DTTL (also referred to as “Deloitte Global”) does not provide services to clients.

Deloitte refers to one or more of the US member firms of DTTL, their related entities that operate using the “Deloitte” name in the United States and their respective affiliates. Certain services may not be available to attest clients under the rules and regulations of public accounting. Please see www.deloitte.com/about to learn more about our global network of member firms. Copyright © 2017 Deloitte Development LLC. All rights reserved.

Apply Now

item.title: Caterpillar Recruitment 2023 | Associate IT Analyst | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Caterpillar Recruitment 2023 – Caterpillar is scheduled to hire for the post of Associate IT Analyst for B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA graduates in Bangalore. The detailed eligibility and application process are given below.

Caterpillar Recruitment 2023 Details:

Detailed Eligibility

Educational Qualifications

Associate IT Analyst

  • Requires Bachelors’s/master’s degree from a reputed institute with good academic scores in the computer science engineering stream.
  • Knowledgeable of current technology, including one or more of the following: programming languages, computing software environments, system integration processes, and current development processes and tools.
  • Very Strong in programming languages that include Python and ReactJS
  • Strong knowledge of Web development technologies HTML5, JavaScript, Node.js, CSS etc
  • Strong Knowledge on Framework and stack: – Java, C, C++, NodeJS
  • Strong knowledge of database concepts & Strong in SQL
  • Knowledge and exposure to Machine Learning models and Algorithms.
  • A strong passion for empirical research and for answering hard questions with data.
  • Prior working experience in projects/corporates would be an added advantage.

Job Duties

  • This position reports to an IT Supervisor, Senior IT Supervisor, or IT Manager, as do other staff jobs in systems and programming work.
  • This role understands and executes standard work to ensure the scope of services achieved and maintains an appropriate level of risk and compliance to internal policies and procedures, including those relating to sustainability, cybersecurity, SOX, and IT General Controls.
  • Other job duties include, but not limited to:
    • Codes, tests, and debugs programs of varying degrees of difficulty.
    • Works on application/technical problem identification and resolution, including off-shift and weekend support functions.
    • Works with limited assistance on increasingly complex programs or subroutines.
    • Under the direction of more senior analysts, assists in developing or integrating major system modules and programs.
    • Knowledgeable of the current operating environment, programming languages, logic diagrams, testing, debugging and documentation.
    • Follows established development and support processes.
    • Typically serves as a team member on one or more 6 Sigma projects. The incumbents are considered the first level of programming expertise and work within defined objectives and instructions from IT people to design test and document systems and programs.
    • Work with finance business users to understand business problems and build solutions / POC and recommendations.
    • Works independently on one or more applications or systems. Provide actionable insights and support rollout/implementation.

Job Purpose 

To complete proposed changes or additions to systems and programs. Assist more experienced application development and support personnel in developing solutions to customer-related requests and/or systems problems. Develop and write related program logic or integrate solutions into the systems and/or infrastructure.

Apply Now

item.title: Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 | SASA Role | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 Is Scheduled To Hire 2022 And 2023 Batch Students From All streams/branches of  B.Sc., BCA, BBA, B.A, B.Com, B.Voc, BMS, B.B.S, B.F.M, B.B.I, B.A.F, B.Ed., B.M.M., B.FA, , B.S.Micr ,B. Design, M.C.M, M.Sc (Non-CS/IT), M.A, M.Com or M.FA from 2022 & 2023 year of passouts with full-time education only All Further Details Given Below.

Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023

Double Click To Apply Now

JOB DESCRIPTION

System and Application Services Associate

About Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services--all powered by the world's largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners, and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Role Overview

Join our team that improve the way our clients and the world works. Working in challenging and dynamic environments, using their versatility to create and support solutions that meet client requirements from analysis to implementation

What would you do? 

App/cloud engineering

  • Identify and solve issues within applications and infrastructure. 
  • Drive resolution of functional, technical and infrastructure issues for clients
  • Guide clients with a variety of expertise (from users to admins and developers) in overcoming technology challenges
  • Focus on driving automation, self-service, and evolving cloud infrastructure environments

Project control services

  • Enable program management and increase the overall quality of Technology Delivery
  • Support projects in the Technology Delivery Centers by tracking and managing project management office activities
  • Proactively monitor, manage, report on execution of deliverables, and solve issues
  • Manage multiple stakeholders to align priorities and direction.

Low/no code app development

  • Develop applications using a low-code development platform, setting up and configuring systems for each client's unique requirements
  • Work with three key elements: form builders, pre-built templates, drag-and-drop visual interface, entity builder
  • Research and analyze internal business processes with the scope of optimizing and automating them

Test automation engineering

  • Creation of test designs, test processes, test cases and test data
  • Apply business and functional knowledge including testing standards, guidelines, and testing methodology to meet the teams overall test objectives
  • Responsible for designing testing scenarios for usability testing
  • Prepare all reports related to software testing carried out
  • Analyze the results and then submit the observations to the development team

What we need? 

  • As we provide service for our clients across the globe, we expect you to be flexible to work across different time zones/shifts
  • You are willing to work in any Business Unit/Service line within the company
  • You are willing to join /relocate to any Accenture office across India

Eligibility Criteria:

  • All streams/branches of  B.Sc., BCA, BBA, B.A, B.Com, B.Voc, BMS, B.B.S, B.F.M, B.B.I, B.A.F, B.Ed., B.M.M., B.FA, , B.S.Micr ,B. Design, M.C.M, M.Sc (Non-CS/IT), M.A, M.Com or M.FA from 2022 & 2023 year of passouts with full-time education only (Part-time and distance educations are not considered)

Note: BE/ BTECH / ME / MTECH/MCA/ MSC (CS and IT Branch) MBA /PGDBM candidates are not eligible to apply for this role

  • No active backlogs during application and/or during onboarding.
  • You should have completed your relevant degree (eligible for this job role), in the stipulated duration of the degree. Hence, there should be no gaps during the course of your degree. Eg: You must complete your BBA in 3 years or your M.Sc in 2 years.
  • Candidate should not have appeared for Accenture Recruitment assessment/interview process in the last three months.
  • Candidate should not have more than 11 months of experience
  • Candidates must be eligible to work in India by citizenship/ have relevant work permit documents. Please note that Bhutan and Nepal nationals can work in India without a need for obtaining a work visa. All other foreign nationals require work visa or an Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI) or Person of Indian Origin (PIO) card to work in India
  • As we provide service for our clients across the globe, we expect you to be flexible to work across different time zones/shifts
  • You are willing to work in any Business Unit/Service line within the company
  • You are willing to join /relocate to any Accenture office across India

Apply for Job Role

  • If you are eligible, you will receive an email invitation to attend online assessments
  • The assessment is scheduled in two stages, and must be completed within the scheduled time

Mock Assessment

  • You will get a 10-minute mock/practice assessment
  • Mock assessment is mandatory, and it will ensure that you have the right hardware, software and internet 
  • This assessment will help you to get an experience of the assessments

Assessment #1: Cognitive assessment

  • You will get 50 minutes to complete this assessment

Cognitive assessment includes 50 questions on:

  • English ability
  • Critical thinking and Problem solving
  • Abstract Reasoning

Cognitive assessment result will be notified within 5-10 minutes post completion. You are advised to remain seated and await result.

  • Technical assessment will commence immediately post result notification. Technical assessment is optional and isnot an elimination round.

Assessment #2: Technical assessment (Optional)

Note: Technical assessment is not an elimination round but scores of the technical assessment will be factored into the overall selection process score which will determine final selection.

You will get 40 minutes to complete this assessment

Technical assessment includes 40 questions on

  • Common Application and MS office
  • Pseudocode
  • Fundamentals of Networking, Security
  • Fundamentals of Cloud

Assessment #3: Communication assessment

  • The duration of this assessment is approximately 30 minutes
  • You will receive a separate email with timelines and login details to participate in this assessment
  • Communication assessment will assess you on the below mentioned parameters
  • Sentence Mastery
  • Vocabulary
  • Fluency
  • Pronunciation

Apply Now

item.title: H-Town Technologies Hiring 2023 | Full Stack Developer
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
H-Town Technologies Off Campus Drive 2023 notification announced for the posts of Full Stack Developer. Candidates with the qualification of B.E/B.Tech/MCA/BCA are eligible to apply. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online. The detailed eligibility and application process are given below.

H-Town Technologies Off Campus Drive 2023 Details

Detailed Eligibility

Full Stack Developer

  • Qualification – B.E /B.Tech (IT, CS), MCA, BCA
  • Graduation year of passing – 2022 / 2023
  • Experience – 0 to 1 year

Note:

  • Work Mode – Work from the office
  • Employment Type – Permanent
  • Salary – Rs 4lacs per annum
  • Service Bond – Yes, 2 years services bond including training. If the candidate leaves the organization within 2 years of joining, he/she will be liable to pay back H-town.
  • Joining Date – Immediate joiners will be preferred.

Requirements:

  • Willing to work in Visakhapatnam
  • Thorough proficiency in any one of the full stack technology and willingness to learn new technologies, acquire new skill sets.
  • Should be comfortable to work in front end as well as back end development.
  • Skilled in fundamental front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, and Java Script.
  • Java Script frameworks such as React JS, React Native, Angular JS.
  • Any server-side languages such as Python, Java, PHP and .Net.
  • Database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB.
  • Excellent communication skills and interpersonal skills.
  • Able to work in fast paced environment
  • Should have excellent problem-solving skills with positive attitude
  • Self-learner, proactive having attention to detail
  • Team player who can manage his time and work stack adequately
  • Knowledge of Agile development methodology, JIRA, BIT Bucket, Continuous Integration & Deployment will be an advantage.

Responsibilities:

  • Understand development requirements from Product Owner
  • Work with UI/UX designer for finalizing user interface features
  • Develop highly responsive user interface and Develop back end APIs
  • Develop front end and back end keeping in mind overall product performance
  • Ensure cross platform development for websites and optimization for mobile apps
  • Ensure perfect responsiveness
  • Meet technical as well as functional product needs
  • Clearly demonstrate development done to end users
  • Formulate proof of concept for given technical problems and demonstrate its solution
  • Estimation and timely completion of given responsibilities
  • Staying abreast of latest technology development in web and mobile app development
  • Work independently and collaborate with rest of the engineering team
  • Manual and automation testing of code written by self as well as others

What the role entails?

  • Full-stack developers will be responsible for developing and testing user interactions on web & mobile apps, cross-platform coding for web & mobile apps, and developing server & database functionalities.
  • Full stack developers will be working in agile environment and should be quick to adapt to changes, meet deadlines, see project from conception to rollout and be willing to learn new technologies.

Why work with us?

  • Opportunity to be a part of a fast-paced, growing start-up
  • Work on cutting-edge technologies
  • Open and friendly work environment
  • Competitive salary and benefits

DXC Technology Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for DXC Technology Off Campus Drive 2023:

Eligibility Criteria

Basic Qualifications

  • A four-year undergraduate degree or a comparable combination of education and practical experience.
  • A preferred qualification for this position is a Bachelor's degree in business administration, finance, accounting, or a related discipline.
  • No prior experience in finance or accounting is required.
  • Proficiency in using accounting software and familiarity with generally accepted accounting principles are prerequisites.
  • Proficiency in financial analysis is also required.

Other Qualifications

  • Strong verbal and written communication abilities
  • Proficiency in using personal computer and business solutions software
  • Effective organization skills to manage and prioritize workload
  • Analytical mindset and problem-solving capabilities
  • Capable of working both independently and collaboratively as a team member
  • Openness to travel as required

Job Description

  • Supports in conducting financial analyses, encompassing budgeting, trend analysis, forecasting, rectifying, and financial modeling, with the intention of furnishing management with relevant information.
  • Assists in gathering financial data, including budget, midyear forecast, and other pertinent information, to present comprehensive insights into profit and loss.
  • Aids in scrutinizing budget, midyear forecast, and other financial data, identifying and recommending resolutions for basic issues or inconsistencies to management.
  • Assists in creating and maintaining financial statements using accounting and budgeting software, ensuring standardized reports are generated for customers and management.
  • May deliver financial training sessions to employees, fostering their comprehension and assisting them in completing budgets and other financial analyses.
  • Monitors and resolves problems, while also delivering financial reports to user organizations.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Creates and records regular journal entries for company accounts, guaranteeing the accuracy and currency of the information.
  • Reconciles balance sheet and income statement accounts with the general ledger, investigating and suggesting appropriate actions for minor inconsistencies.
  • Constructs simple spreadsheets for account analysis and journal entries, ensuring the organization and standardization of records.
  • Provides assistance for special projects, including accounting software updates, when required.
  • Conducts studies and proposes enhancements to procedures and processes.
  • Assists in the installation, modification, documentation, and coordination of tasks.

item.title: Federal Bank Off Campus Drive 2023 | Clerk Associate
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Federal Bank Off Campus Drive 2023 : Federal Bank Off Campus Drive 2023 for candidates who graduated in the years 2022 or 2023. The drive is open for individuals who hold a Bachelor's degree in any discipline. If you have an interest in this opportunity, we encourage you to submit your application promptly.

Federal Bank Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Federal Bank Off Campus Drive 2023

Eligibility Criteria

  • Candidates must have completed their graduation from a university incorporated by an Act of the Central or State legislature in India or other educational institutions established by an Act of Parliament. Alternatively, they should possess a qualification recognized by the Ministry of HRD, Government of India, or approved by AICTE.
  • A minimum aggregate of 60% throughout Class X, XII, and graduation is required.
  • Candidates who are currently in the process of completing their graduation or have graduated in the academic year 2022-2023 are eligible to apply.
  • The graduation course should consist of at least three years of education after completing higher secondary schooling or a diploma.

Who Can Apply

  • Applicants must hold a Bachelor's degree with a minimum aggregate of 60% from a university incorporated by an Act of the Central or State legislature in India, or from other educational institutions established by an Act of Parliament, or declared as deemed universities under Section 3 of the UGC Act, 1956. Alternatively, candidates can possess an equivalent qualification recognized by the Ministry of HRD, Government of India, or approved by AICTE.
  • A minimum aggregate of 60% or above in Class X, Class XII, and Graduation is required.
  • To be eligible for the selection process, candidates must not exceed 24 years of age as of 01.06.2023 (born on or after 01.06.1999). However, for SC/ST candidates, the age limit is 29 years as of 01.06.2023 (born on or after 01.06.1994).
  • Candidates must be Indian citizens.

Roles and Responsibilities

Upon being selected, the chosen candidates will be obligated to sign a Service Level Agreement upon their commencement with the Bank. This agreement entails their commitment to serve the Bank for a minimum duration of 2 years. In the event that a candidate decides to leave the Bank before completing the specified minimum service period, they will be required to reimburse the Bank a sum of Rs.30,000/- as the cost of their training (subject to the Bank's approval and adherence to established regulations).

Selection Rounds

  • The recruitment process will consist of multiple selection rounds, including an Online Aptitude Assessment, Potential Assessment through Group Discussion/Preliminary Interaction, and Personal Interview (or other modes as determined by the Bank).
  • Each round will be elimination-based, meaning that candidates who do not meet the required criteria will be eliminated from further consideration.
  • The Bank reserves the right to shortlist only the necessary number of candidates based on administrative needs during the screening rounds.
  • The Online Aptitude Assessment and Potential Assessment through Group Discussion/Preliminary Interaction will be conducted virtually, while the Personal Interview may be conducted in-person at various interview centers or virtually, depending on prevailing circumstances and the Bank's discretion.
  • Marks or ratings obtained by candidates during the selection rounds will remain confidential and will not be disclosed.
  • The Bank's decisions regarding qualifying criteria in each selection round will be final, binding on the candidates, and not subject to disclosure.

More Details About This

Apply Now

Global Payments Off Campus Drive 2023 : Global Payments Off Campus Drive 2023 Global Payments Drive is conducting an Off Campus Drive for candidates belonging to the batch of 2022/2023. The company is inviting applications from individuals who hold a Bachelor's degree in any field. If you possess the required qualifications and are interested in this opportunity, we encourage you to submit your application promptly.

Global Payments Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Global Payments Off Campus Drive 2023:

Eligibility Criteria

  • A Bachelor's degree is a requirement for this position.
  • Candidates with a degree in Computer Science or Management Information Systems are given priority, although candidates with other degrees will also be considered.
  • Previous experience in a relevant field is not typically necessary.
  • Having previous experience in IT Server, Network, and/or PC Support, or IT customer support will be an added advantage.

Role

  • Responsible for the installation, maintenance, and repair of servers and network devices on the edge (such as desktops, laptops, MDM platform, MACs) and associated systems.
  • Ensures that all installation, repair, and maintenance processes adhere to company policies, standards, and industry best practices.
  • Assists in the selection of appropriate software to meet user needs and requirements.
  • Performs troubleshooting of software and hardware failures, as well as identifying and resolving network issues specifically related to servers, desktops, laptops, MDM platform, and peripheral equipment.

Responsibility

  • Prepares desktops and laptops for deployment by imaging devices and conducting thorough testing to ensure proper functionality.
  • Ensures seamless integration of Thin Client and Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) devices with file servers, mail servers, and other relevant systems.
  • Takes the lead in setting up and configuring hardware and software for new team members as the primary analyst.
  • Assists in maintaining the functionality and efficiency of computer and user objects within the active directory.
  • Configures user access to basic Local Area Network (LAN) services, including setting up email accounts for new team members and removing access for terminated team members.
  • Constructs and configures the necessary infrastructure that supports LAN services under appropriate supervision.
  • Addresses routine technical issues related to desktop/laptop hardware, such as replacing peripheral equipment in case of failure, resolving basic software corruption in Microsoft Operating Systems, and troubleshooting installed software.
  • Ensures that technical issues are resolved effectively by delivering replacement equipment as instructed.

Desired Skills and Capabilities

  • Skills / Knowledge - Learns to use professional concepts. Applies company policies and procedures to resolve routine issues.
  • Job Complexity - Works on problems of limited scope. Follows standard practices and procedures in analyzing situations or data from which answers can be readily obtained. Builds stable working relationships internally.
  • Supervision - Normally receives detailed instructions on all work.
  • Client facing communication skills - Builds positive customer relationships, and works with clients to understand and respond to issues
  • Problem resolution skills - Investigates and provides solutions to issues, incidents, and problems
  • Organization - Prioritizes work according to business need, with minimal support

item.title: Hawkins Off Campus Drive 2023 | Management Trainee | Apply now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Hawkins Off Campus Drive 2023 : Hawkins Off Campus Drive 2023 is hosting an Off Campus Drive for candidates who are part of the batch of 2022/2023. They are inviting applications from individuals who hold a Bachelor's degree in any field. Candidates meeting these criteria are encouraged to submit their applications promptly if they are interested in participating in the Drive process.

Hawkins Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Hawkins Off Campus Drive 2023

Eligibility Criteria

IT Programmers

We are seeking individuals with a strong practical understanding of one or more of the following programming languages: C++, C#, SQL, Java, ASP.Net, HTML/CSS, XML, Python, Android, DART, the Apple environment, React Native. Additionally, proficiency in data visualization tools such as Tableau and Power BI is desired. Candidates should possess a genuine passion for coding and enjoy finding solutions to real-world problems. The role entails creating reports, implementing automation, and providing IT support to various business departments. Knowledge of Data Science & Analytics, particularly in the context of analyzing consumer and customer data with GIS mapping, is highly valued. It is worth noting that our IT Department in Hawkins primarily focuses on developing in-house systems rather than relying on third-party software for ERP and CRM solutions. This presents a valuable opportunity to gain extensive experience in system development.

Technical/ Engineering

We are looking for individuals with diplomas, engineering degrees, or postgraduate qualifications in various fields such as Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Tool Design and Manufacture, Process Engineering and Machine Design, Product Design, Industrial Engineering, Supply Chain, Material Science, or Robotics.

The available positions may include roles in Quality, focusing on quality improvement, problem-solving, setting standards, testing, and quality control. Candidates should have knowledge of statistical quality control techniques, root cause analysis, quality circles, documentation related to quality and processes, and both destructive and non-destructive testing. They should also be capable of leading quality improvement projects.

In Automation, the responsibilities may involve designing and creating specialized machines, robotic assembly lines, pick-and-place setups, and implementing Manufacturing 4.0 concepts. Familiarity with Poka-yoke, Kaizen, and other interventions aimed at enhancing products and reducing costs is desirable.

For Supply Chain roles, the tasks will revolve around procuring raw materials such as aluminum, stainless steel, and paper, as well as semi-finished and finished components, electrical and electronic parts. Candidates should have experience in vendor development and purchasing finished goods for bought-out items.

It's important to note that Hawkins manufactures all its products in India. Therefore, jobs in manufacturing will entail overseeing operations in press shops, machine shops, anodizing shops, or assembly shops. Successful candidates will lead teams of workers to ensure the production of high-quality goods.

Sales/Marketing

May be posted in important towns in various parts of India. The job involves travelling intensively, managing dealers and modern retail, and achieving sales targets with incentives. May have the opportunity, based on performance, to attend Foreign Conferences. After some Sales experience, based upon suitability, some candidates may be moved to Marketing. In marketing the roles may involve Market Research, Digital Marketing, Creating Videos, Development of Showrooms, Brand and Product management, Packaging and Communication Design.

Executive Assistants

We are seeking dynamic graduates proficient in computer usage from any academic background. Candidates can be recent graduates or have a few years of relevant experience. The role involves working closely with Senior Managers and providing comprehensive support across various aspects of the business. This opportunity will provide exposure to multiple areas of the company's operations.

Essential qualifications include fluency in word processing and the ability to comprehend instructions and execute tasks with a proactive approach. Successful candidates will have the chance to gain hands-on experience and develop a deep understanding of the business.

Depending on the interests of the candidates and the requirements of the company, these assistants may be transitioned to line management roles in different departments after a couple of years. This will allow them to further their career and take on more responsibility within the organization.

Accounts

We are looking for a good knowledge of Accounts, Direct and Indirect Taxation, control aspects of accounting, Audit and Reconciliation. Hawkins runs its own accounting IT systems. A challenging and exciting part of this job will be that you can design reports and systems and are not limited to running an existing legacy software. A good understanding of accounting standards and the ability to deal with internal and external auditors is required. May be posted at any of the factories or offices. Cost and Chartered Accounts may start higher.

Legal

Advise the Company on legal matters, monitor and ensure legal compliances, brief counsel and organise action to avoid or support litigation as needed. Action to protect the intellectual property of the Company such as Trade Mark, Copy Rights, Designs and Patents are important. There are also occasions where action needs to be taken against spurious parts and products. A good understanding of Labour Law – as we run three factories – will be useful. An opportunity to deal with wide ranging facets of law and compliance including Labour law, Company law, Commercial law, Packaged commodities, international contracts, dealing with Government regulations are all part of this job.

Company Secretary qualified persons may also apply.

Human Resources

The position entails:

  • Recognizing the requirements of the organization and sourcing suitable individuals to meet those needs.
  • Conducting annual performance evaluations, assisting with career development plans, facilitating employee induction and training programs.
  • Overseeing the recruitment process, including candidate selection and termination when necessary.
  • Engaging in negotiations with labor unions and providing feedback to senior management.

A solid comprehension of behavioral science, motivation techniques, performance evaluations, labor legislation, and recruitment practices is essential for this role.

Commercial

The Role Involves the Commercial activities of the Company such as managing stores – where the job is to check and receive incoming material for quality and quantity as per the invoices, purchase orders; timely issue of material as per the requisitions of the manufacturing departments; maintain stocks as per the Company’s inventory policy; review physical quantities periodically and advise required actions such for procurement of short items / disposal of obsolete material; timely selling of scrap at best possible prices.

Age limit to apply : 21 to 28 years

item.title: Tech Mahindra Off Campus Drive 2023 | Associate Software Engineer | Apply now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Tech Mahindra Off Campus Drive 2023 : is planning to recruit Associate Software Engineers for graduates from the 2022 and 2023 B.E/B.Tech/MCA/M.SC batches. The comprehensive requirements and steps for eligibility and application are outlined in detail for the Tech Mahindra Off Campus Drive.

Tech Mahindra Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Tech Mahindra Off Campus Drive 2023

Profile Details

  • Tech Mahindra is seeking candidates who have completed their B.E/B.Tech/MCA/M.Sc. in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, E&C, E&TC, Telecom, Communication, or Electronics.
  • The recruitment drive is open to graduates from the 2022 and 2023 batches, provided they have no pending backlogs and possess either a consolidated mark sheet or a provisional degree certificate.
  • Applicants must have achieved a minimum score of 70% (without rounding up) in their 10th, 12th/Diploma (if applicable), and their respective degrees (BE/B.Tech/MCA/M.Sc. in Computer Science).
  • It is essential that candidates have not experienced any academic year loss after completing their 10th standard.
  • Preference will be given to candidates who can provide their PC (Provisional Certificate) or a consolidated mark sheet for the evaluation process.

Selection Process

The selection process for eligible candidates consists of multiple tests, each acting as a criterion for proceeding to the subsequent stage of the process.

  • Aptitude, English Essay/Story
  • Psychometric & Technical
  • Communication
  • Technical Interview
  • HR Interview

Candidates who meet the eligibility criteria will be sent a test link for all rounds to the email address provided during registration. It is advised for candidates to also check their junk/spam folders for the test link.

Super coder Selection

  • Candidates who demonstrate outstanding academic performance and excel in the selection process (excluding the HR round) will be eligible for consideration in the Supercoder cadre selection.
  • Qualified candidates will proceed to take the Supercoder test, and those who successfully pass the test will be recognized and designated as Supercoders.

Location of Work & Work Schedule

The candidate should be open to working on various projects at any of Tech's Development Centers or client sites nationwide. The work schedule will adhere to the designated company timings, which may include different shifts.

Agreement & Remuneration

On selection,

  • Selected candidates will undergo a probationary period of 3 months.
  • Candidates who successfully pass the standard selection process will qualify for a Consolidated Term (CT) of INR 3.25 Lakhs per annum.
  • Candidates who successfully pass the Supercoder selection process will qualify for a Consolidated Term (CT) of INR 5.5 Lakhs per annum.
  • Upon joining the company, candidates are obligated to sign an indemnity bond worth INR IL, committing to a mandatory service period of 2 years from the date of joining.

Apply Now

Ideas2IT Off Campus Drive 2023

Eligibility Criteria

  • Candidates who have completed their Bachelor of Science (B.Sc), Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA), Bachelor of Engineering (B.E) or Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) degrees in the years 2022 and 2023, with specializations in Computer Science Engineering (CSE), Information Technology (IT), Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE), Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE), Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering (EIE), Mechanical Engineering, or Mathematics, are eligible to apply.
  • Post-graduates who have completed their Master of Engineering (M.E), Master of Technology (M.Tech), Master of Computer Applications (MCA), Master of Science (MS), or Master of Science (M.Sc) degrees in Computer Science or Information Technology in the years 2022 and 2023 are also eligible to apply.
  • The minimum academic qualification cutoff is 70% in all the mentioned qualifications.
  • The desired attributes and experience include strong aptitude, problem-solving skills, logical thinking abilities, a quick learning aptitude, and a positive attitude.
  • While having a fundamental programming skill would be advantageous, it is not mandatory.

item.content:encoded:
Clinisys Off Campus Drive 2023 : Clinisys Off Campus Drive 2023 is for individuals from the batch of 2022/2023 to participate in their recruitment process. Candidates holding a Bachelor's degree in any field are eligible to apply for the Drive. If you have a keen interest in this opportunity, we encourage you to submit your application without delay.

Clinisys Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Clinisys Off Campus Drive 2023

Eligibility Criteria

  • Applicants should possess a Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field, or have equivalent experience.
  • Candidates should have 0-2 years of experience in working with the software development life cycle, software testing methodologies, and quality assurance.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, and understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOPS) concepts are required.
  • Familiarity with multi-tiered application design and development is necessary.
  • Knowledge of RDBMS design, including SQL Server and Oracle, as well as HTML/DHTML and Java Script is expected.
  • Effective verbal and written communication skills are essential for clear and concise expression.
  • Strong collaboration and teamwork skills are highly valued for effective cooperation with colleagues.
  • A solid understanding of scripting and object-oriented software development principles is necessary.
  • Functional knowledge of both relational and non-relational databases is required.
  • Strong development skills and a comprehensive understanding of software development methodologies are expected.
  • Familiarity with refactoring or re-engineering solutions is desired.

Essential Functions

  • Responsible for developing software solutions across various subsystems within our applications.
  • Collaborates with requirements definition, prototyping, architectural design, coding, testing, and deployment phases of software development.
  • Possesses a deep understanding of our applications, their structure, and how customers utilize them.
  • Conducts research on new technologies and development tools to stay updated with current trends.
  • Creates documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, code comments, and clear, readable code to document and demonstrate solutions.
  • Conducts analysis of defects, performs root cause analysis, and collaborates with team members to resolve issues.
  • Adheres to established internal quality systems and considers standards, best practices, and regulatory requirements during coding activities.
  • Performs any additional duties and responsibilities assigned.
