item.title: TATA Off Campus Drive 2023 | Graduate Engineer Trainee | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
TATA Off Campus Drive 2023 Is Scheduled For The Role Graduate Engineer Trainee From BCA Bsc BE And BTech Students Can Apply, All The Details Are Given Below.

TATA Off Campus Drive 2023

Role and Responsibilities :

  • Quality of Work - Doing one's assignment / job within the prescribed quality standards

Preferred Skills :

  • Good communication skills in Gujarati, English and HindiGood interpersonal skills
  • Good Command over MS Office, especially Excel & Power PointAnalytical & Logical approach
  • Creativity & Innovation - Trainees are expected to bring in a new thought process, design and develop new processes, work flows etc.
  • Learning & Development - A trainee is expected to experience & imbibe all the learning and training opportunities that have been planned for him / her.
  • Safety Compliance - The general conduct of the trainee should uphold all Safety Regulations
  • Attitude - A "Positive & Go Getter" attitude will hold the Trainee in good stead
  • Team Work - A trainee will be expected to be a team player in performing many assignments during the training period.
  • Taking Initiative - A trainee is expected to always take the initiative and not be passive.
  • Adaptability & Flexibility - Due to the complex nature of the plant, a Trainee should display the qualities that will allow the company to utilize the trainee in any section of the plant & in any role
  • Integrity - Upholding all the values mentioned in the TATA Code of Conduct in letter and spirit
  • Project Work - A big part of the DET training will be 2 unique projects given to the trainee. The trainee is expected to complete both projects within the prescribed time frame to the best of his / her ability.
  • Volunteering Work - The trainee is expected to participate in various volunteer programs to make the work place and township livelier and to increase the camaraderie.

Qualifications and Education Requirements:   Graduate Engineers 

Work Experience:  College Freshers

About Us Tata Chemicals

The story of the company is about harnessing the fruits of science for goals that go beyond business. We operate through two verticals - Basic Chemistry and Specialty Chemistry. The company's Basic Chemistry product range provides key ingredients to many of the world-s leading brands for glass, detergents, pharma, biscuit manufacturing, bakeries and other industries.

We have the largest saltworks in Asia, and are the 3rd largest soda ash manufacturer and the 6th largest sodium bicarbonate manufacturer in the world.

Our innovations in Specialty Chemistry have led to establishing Tata NQ -- India's first and only nutritional science business. We have pioneered the production of Fossence and Gossence, a range of healthy prebiotic products which is marketed to B2B customers across India, North America, Europe, Middle East and Asia. The company has a strong position in the crop protection business through its subsidiary company Rallis India Ltd.

Our green patented technology for manufacturing Highly Dispersible Silica is focused on delivering value addition to a number of industries, including high performance tyres, oral care, paints and additives, etc. In Energy Sciences, we are creating a platform to provide cutting-edge solutions around Lithium Ion cell technology.

Our strength lies in science and our Innovation Centre at Pune is home to world-class R&D capabilities in nanotechnology and biotechnology. Our other innovation centres are located at Mithapur and Bengaluru.

Sustainability as a practice is at the core of all of Tata Chemicals- activities, including our corporate social responsibility initiatives, and is intricately woven into all our business functions. In 2018, we set up the Centre of Excellence for Coastal and Marine Conservation, and the Centre for Sustainable Agriculture and Farm Excellence. Our vision is to be a leading sustainable chemicals solutions company serving customers through innovation and science.

Apply Now

item.title: HERE Technologies Recruitment 2023 for Trainee Role
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
HERE Technologies Recruitment 2023 – HERE Technologies is scheduled to hire for the role of Trainee (Apprentice) for B.E/B.Tech/BSc.IT/BSc.CS/BCA  at Mumbai. The detailed eligibility criteria and application process are given below.

HERE Technologies Recruitment 2023 Details:
Who are you?
  • Bachelor’s degree in computers, B.Sc.IT, BSc.CS, BCA, and related fields.
  • Basic computer skills with knowledge of office software applications
  • Detail oriented
  • Basic analytical, innovative thinking, and problem-solving skills
  • Basic written and oral communication skills
Responsibilities
  • Trainee would be trained on proprietary software, tools, and basic navigation attributes to the HERE digital map database.
  • This role requires learning specific instructions, procedures, and defined processes
  • Skill development on proprietary tools and limited functions
  • Work with proprietary tools, using source material to apply basic navigation attributes including but not limited to names, addresses, speed categories, functional class entry of roadways, intersection coding, restricted driving maneuvers, administrative and postal coding as well as various other basic attribute codings
  • Maintain compliance with database specifications, ensuring the quality criteria is met along with baseline speed and project requirements
  • Complete all assigned tasks in a timely manner. ( may be provided team-based assignment as applicable)
  • Collaborate with co-workers to make sure that the maps created are stable and correct and are in agreement with the regional map standards.
  • Ensure compliance with the defined organizational processes with respect to work completion, reporting, time tracking, leaves, etc
About Here Technologies
  • HERE Technologies is a location data and technology platform company. We empower our customers to achieve better outcomes – from helping a city manage its infrastructure or a business optimize its assets to guiding drivers to their destination safely.
  • At HERE we take it upon ourselves to be the change we wish to see. We create solutions that fuel innovation, provide opportunity and foster inclusion to improve people’s lives.

Apply Now

Ecolab Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Ecolab Off Campus Drive 2023

Role and Responsibility

item.title: GE Healthcare Recruitment 2023 | Software Engineer role | Apply now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
GE Healthcare Recruitment 2023 : GE Healthcare Recruitment 2023 is currently inviting applications for the position of Software Engineer for the year 2023. This opportunity is open to graduates with a B.E, B.Tech, or B.SC degree. For more comprehensive information about the eligibility criteria and the application procedure, please refer to the details provided below.

GE Healthcare Recruitment 2023
Eligibility Criteria for GE Healthcare Recruitment 2023

Job Description Summary

The role entails the creation, development, and upkeep of software applications and services in the domains of machine, platform, and/or application. This includes managing the entire software lifecycle, encompassing tasks like analyzing requirements, documenting processes, and executing implementations.

GE Healthcare, a prominent worldwide provider of medical technology and digital solutions, is committed to enhancing lives during crucial moments. Embrace your aspirations, transform ideas into impactful realities, and become a part of an organization where every individual's contribution matters, fostering a healthier global community.

Roles and Responsibilities

In this position, your responsibilities will involve:

  • Partnering with system engineers, frontend developers, and software developers to develop solutions that align with existing shared platforms and solutions while also extending their capabilities.
  • Creating code that adheres to established standards and fulfills the required functionality, utilizing the chosen technology for the project.
  • Analyzing performance metrics and evaluating the performance of applications.
  • Engaging with fundamental data structures and algorithms and applying them in the preferred programming language.

Education Qualification

For positions located in countries other than the USA:

Applicants should hold a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related fields falling under the STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) category. A foundational level of experience in the relevant field is required.

Technical Expertise

Candidates should possess 0-3 years of experience, demonstrating a fundamental grasp of C and C++ programming languages on Linux systems, and exhibiting a robust understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOPS) principles.

Moreover, applicants should have knowledge about methodologies and approaches like Lean, Agile, XP, etc.

Nice to have

Familiarity with the fundamental concepts of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and various methodologies such as Lean, Agile, and XP is preferred. Additionally, candidates should have a grasp of concepts related to Continuous Integration (CI), Software and Product Security, Scalability, Documentation Practices, Refactoring, and Testing Techniques.

Furthermore, applicants should be knowledgeable about and capable of implementing Continuous Integration (CI) practices. They should also possess a basic comprehension of how technology choices can impact the software development life cycle.

Additional Information

Relocation Assistance Provided: No

Apply Now

item.title: Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 | Mega Hiring | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 planned to conduct Off Campus Drive to hire Associate Software Engineer & System and Application Services Associate for B.E/B.Tech/M.E/M.Tech/MCA/M.Sc  graduates. The more details about Accenture off-campus drive given below.

Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023
Detailed Eligibility

Role Overview
Join our team that is developing, designing and maintaining technologies that improve the way our clients and the world works. Working in challenging and dynamic environments, using their versatility to create and support technology solutions that meet client requirements from analysis to implementation

What would you do? 

As an Associate Software Engineer you would largely be involved in:

  • Design, build, test, assemble, support and configure application using business requirements
  • Understand business drivers that will impact performance and deliver software to those expectations
  • Bake technology trends into solutions; Participate in the development of automation solutions, new functionality and technologies and integrate them in existing solutions
  • Responsible for incident resolution and support extended to customers through voice interaction/email/chat/remote support
What we need?

We would love you to have

  • Ability to anticipate and resolve business issues with agility
  • Multi-disciplinary and versatile with the aptitude to learn and apply new skills faster
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills and proficient in verbal and communication skills
  • Deliver code, to time and quality expectations and participate in peer reviews
  • Take ownership of the successful implementation of the solution
  • Support infrastructure operations and /or manage delivery for IT production system and services
  • Flexibility to relocate for project deployment to any part of India and work in 24X7 shifts basis business requirement

Also, the below mentioned will be preferred

  • Basic understanding of ABAP Development on HANA, CDS, AMDP, Performance Analysis
  • Experience or knowledge in configuration, customisation of Salesforce.com applications
  • Good working knowledge in J2EE and full-stack development
  • Knowledge and development experience of .NET (ASP.NET/ASP.NET MVC)
Test automation engineering
  • Creation of test designs, test processes, test cases and test data
  • Apply business and functional knowledge including testing standards, guidelines, and testing methodology to meet the teams overall test objectives
  • Responsible for designing testing scenarios for usability testing
  • Prepare all reports related to software testing carried out
  • Analyze the results and then submit the observations to the development team
Eligibility Criteria
  • All streams/branches of B.E/B.Tech/M.E/M.Tech, MCA, and M.Sc. (CSE, IT only) from 2022 & 2023 year of pass outs with full-time education only (Part-time and distance educations are not considered)

o   Note: MBA /PGDBM candidates are not eligible to apply for this role

  • No active backlogs during application and/or during onboarding.
  • You should have completed your relevant degree (eligible for this job role), in the stipulated duration of the degree. Hence, there should be no gaps during the course of your degree.

o   Eg: You must complete your B.Tech in 4 years or M.Tech/MSc in 2 years.

  • Your highest educational qualification only will be considered
  • Candidate should not have appeared for Accenture Recruitment assessment/interview process in the last three months.
  • Candidate should not have more than 11 months of experience
  • Candidates must be eligible to work in India either by citizenship/ have relevant work permit documents.
  • Please note that Bhutan and Nepal nationals can work in India without a need for obtaining a work visa. All other foreign nationals require work visa or an Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI) or Person of Indian Origin (PIO) card to work in India
  • You are willing to work in any Business Unit/Service line within the company
  • You are willing to join /relocate to any Accenture office across India
Apply Now

item.content:encoded:
Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023 Hiring For SASA Role From All The Three Year Degree Streams Like BSC | BCA | BBA | BA | BCom, All The Details Are Given Below.

Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023

Double Click To Apply Now

Accenture Off Campus Drive 2023

Detailed Eligibility:

  • All streams/branches of B.Sc., BCA, BBA, B.A, B.Com, B.Voc, BMS, B.B.S, B.F.M, B.B.I, B.A.F, B.Ed., B.M.M., B.FA, , B.S.Micr ,B. Design, M.C.M, M.Sc (Non-CS/IT), M.A, M.Com or M.FA from 2022 & 2023 year of passouts with full-time education only (Part-time and distance educations are not considered)
    Note: BE/ BTECH / ME / MTECH/MCA/ MSC (CS and IT Branch) MBA /PGDBM candidates are not eligible to apply for this role
  • No active backlogs during application and/or during onboarding.
  • You should have completed your relevant degree (eligible for this job role), in the stipulated duration of the degree. Hence, there should be no gaps during the course of your degree. Eg: You must complete your BBA in 3 years or your M.Sc in 2 years.
  • Candidate should not have appeared for Accenture Recruitment assessment/interview process in the last three months.
  • Candidate should not have more than 11 months of experience
  • Candidates must be eligible to work in India by citizenship/ have relevant work permit documents. Please note that Bhutan and Nepal nationals can work in India without a need for obtaining a work visa. All other foreign nationals require work visa or an Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI) or Person of Indian Origin (PIO) card to work in India
  • As we provide service for our clients across the globe, we expect you to be flexible to work across different time zones/shifts
  • You are willing to work in any Business Unit/Service line within the company
  • You are willing to join /relocate to any Accenture office across India

What You Will Do

App/cloud engineering

  • Identify and solve issues within applications and infrastructure. 
  • Drive resolution of functional, technical and infrastructure issues for clients
  • Guide clients with a variety of expertise (from users to admins and developers) in overcoming technology challenges
  • Focus on driving automation, self-service, and evolving cloud infrastructure environments

Project control services

  • Enable program management and increase the overall quality of Technology Delivery
  • Support projects in the Technology Delivery Centers by tracking and managing project management office activities
  • Proactively monitor, manage, report on execution of deliverables, and solve issues
  • Manage multiple stakeholders to align priorities and direction.

Low/no code app development

  • Develop applications using a low-code development platform, setting up and configuring systems for each client's unique requirements
  • Work with three key elements: form builders, pre-built templates, drag-and-drop visual interface, entity builder
  • Research and analyze internal business processes with the scope of optimizing and automating them

item.title: Wipro WILP 2023 | BSC/BCA Hiring Freshers | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Wipro WILP 2023 - Wipro Is Planned To Hire BSC And BCA Students From 2021 to 2023 Batch Students And This Is May Be Last Chance For 2021 Batch Students, All The Details Are Given Below

Wipro WILP 2023 All Details
Eligible Criteria
  • Completion of both 10th and 12th standards is a prerequisite.
  • Graduation should have taken place in the years 2021, 2022, or 2023.
  • An aggregate score of at least 60% or a CGPA of 6.0 is mandatory during the graduation period.
  • Applicants eligible for consideration are those pursuing full-time BCA or B.Sc. in fields such as Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics, Electronics, or Physics.
  • Degrees achieved through part-time, correspondence, or distance learning methods will not be entertained.
  • Enrollment in open school or distance education is permissible only for 10th and 12th standards.
  • A single backlog is acceptable up until the evaluation phase. Candidates are required to clear this backlog concurrently with their 6th semester.
  • A maximum education hiatus of 3 years is permissible between the 10th standard and the initiation of undergraduate studies.
  • During the course of graduation, no gaps in education are allowable, and the degree must be obtained within 3 years from the inception of the program.
Additional Criteria
  • In the field of graduation, inclusion of Core Mathematics as a subject is obligatory; subjects like Business Maths or Applied Maths will not be taken into account.
  • Applicants should possess Indian citizenship or hold a PIO or OCI card if they are passport holders from different countries.
  • Citizens of Bhutan or Nepal are required to furnish a citizenship certificate.
  • Individuals who have engaged in any of Wipro's screening procedures within the preceding 3 months do not meet the eligibility criteria.
Special Note

*Wipro retains the complete authority to decide whether to allow or restrict the involvement of any candidate, irrespective of their eligibility, in the selection process for the Work Integrated Learning Program.

Stipend Details
  • Your designation upon joining will be Scholar Trainee.
  • 1st Year: You'll be granted a stipend of INR 15,000 + 488 (ESI) + an initial Joining Bonus of Rs. 75,000 combined with your first month's stipend.
  • 2nd Year: Your stipend will be INR 17,000 + 533 (ESI).
  • 3rd Year: You'll receive a stipend of INR 19,000 + 618 (ESI).
  • 4th Year: Your stipend will be INR 23,000.
  • Upon commencement, you'll be expected to enter into a training agreement spanning 60 months.
  • Please Keep in Mind: Exiting the organization before completing 5 years of the training agreement will entail a proportional payment of INR 75,000.
Any Questions

For any queries/clarifications, please reach out to helpdesk.recruitment@wipro.com using the subject line 'WILP - 2023'. You will receive a response within 3 working days.

Apply Now

item.title: Wipro SIM Hiring 2023 | Diploma Students | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Wipro SIM Hiring 2023 For Diploma Fresher Students From 2021 to 2023 Batches And This Is Last Chance To 2021 Batch Students To Get Hired So Don't Loose This Opportunity, Apply Now

Wipro SIM Hiring 2023
Wipro SIM Hiring 2023 Details

SIM Stands For Wipro's School For IT Infrastructure Management Program

Eligible Streams

Inviting Computer Science / Information Technology / Electronics /
Telecommunication / Computer Engineering / Electronics and Communication / Computer Technology / Computer Science and Technology / Electrical and Electronics Engineering holders of 2021,
2022 and 2023

  • Wipro's Educational Initiative for IT Infrastructure Management:
  • Elevate to a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) qualification
  • Pursue education at renowned academic institutions
  • Benefit from complete funding for your degree
  • Commence your professional journey with Wipro

Via this specialized recruitment initiative, you have the opportunity to enhance your qualifications from diplomas in Computer Science, IT, EC, Electrical and Electronics, or Telecommunication to a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) degree specifically in the field of Information Systems.

You'll not just have the chance to enroll in a degree program at a university recognized as an IoE-ranked (Institute of Eminence) institution, with Wipro covering all your expenses, but you'll also be able to kickstart your professional journey by joining us in a full-time capacity.

Do you meet the requirements?
Academic Criteria:
  • Diploma in Computer Science / Information Technology / Electronics / Telecommunication / Computer Engineering / Electronics and Communication / Computer Technology / Computer Science and Technology / Electrical and Electronics Engineering
  • Year of Completion: 2021, 2022, and 2023
  • Achieved 50% or higher in 10th or 12th grade
  • Attained a minimum of 60% in the diploma program

Sure, here's the provided information presented in a tabular format:

Application Process

Application Process:
Step 1: Registration
Enroll for Wipro's School For IT Infrastructure Management Program in 2023 through a straightforward form submission.

Step 2: Online Evaluation
Applicants meeting the criteria will receive an invitation to participate in a 40-minute online evaluation. This assessment will gauge their verbal, analytical, quantitative, and written communication proficiencies.

Step 3: Professional Conversation
Upon successful completion of the online evaluation phase, candidates will be contacted for a professional conversation with our project team's subject matter experts.

Step 4: Offer Acceptance
If you successfully navigate the professional conversation stage, you will receive a formal offer letter. Accept it to embark on your journey as part of the Wipro team.

Additional Criteria
  • Only full-time diploma programs will be accepted. Part-time, correspondence, or distance learning diplomas are not eligible for consideration.
  • Enrollments from open schools or distance education programs in 10th and 12th grades will be considered.
  • Up to 1 active backlog is permissible until the interview phase. Offers will be granted subject to clearing all backlogs.
  • A maximum of 3 years of educational gap between the 10th standard and the start of the diploma program will be allowed.
  • No gaps in education will be accepted during the diploma program. The program must be completed within 3 years from its commencement.
  • Having core mathematics as one of the subjects in the diploma curriculum is mandatory. Business math and applied math cannot replace core mathematics.
  • Applicants should be Indian citizens or hold a PIO or OCI card if possessing a passport from another country.
  • Bhutan and Nepal citizens need to provide their citizenship certificate.
  • Individuals who have participated in any Wipro selection process within the last three months are not eligible.

item.content:encoded:
BT Off Campus Drive 2023 recruitment notification for the position of Associate Engineer. Individuals possessing the qualifications of B.E/B.Tech/MCA are qualified to submit their applications. Those who are interested and meet the criteria can proceed with the online application process. Further information regarding the specific eligibility criteria and the process of selection is provided in the following sections.

BT Off Campus Drive 2023 for Associate Engineer
Eligibility Criteria in Detail:

Associate Engineer Qualifications: Individuals with B.E/B.Tech/MCA degrees in relevant fields are eligible for the role.

Experience Requirements: It is preferable for candidates to have prior experience in the following areas:

  • Dealing with Data Management, Data Governance, Data security, and Data Solutions within an enterprise context.
  • Familiarity with file transfer technologies such as SFTP and FTPS.
  • Understanding of Cloud storage and transfer methods, including AWS S3, GCS, AWS CLI, and GSUTIL.
  • Proficiency in Git and practices related to devops.
  • Being a self-motivated learner and staying updated about changes in business, technology, and IT practices.
  • Showing interest in conducting Proof of Concepts (POCs) for new technologies, analyzing considerations, setting standards, and sharing them with broader teams.
  • While not mandatory, experience with the Perl programming language is considered beneficial.
Primary Responsibilities:
  • Identifying and implementing continuous improvements to enhance team operations, processes, and work methodologies.
  • Addressing technical and functional/non-functional issues raised by the team or customers and managing escalations when necessary.
  • Delivering software solutions that align with business objectives and customer requirements. This includes designing, documenting, automated testing, deployment, and ongoing support.
  • Promoting the reuse of technology to enhance efficiency and speed up processes.
  • Ensuring team health by providing coaching and fostering team development.
  • Effectively managing key stakeholders to facilitate successful software design and delivery.
  • Providing appropriate support for production and ongoing releases to resolve issues promptly and efficiently.
Required Skills:
  • Stakeholder Management: Building strong relationships with senior-level customers, vendors, suppliers, and BT employees. Proficiently presenting information and facilitating negotiations to support successful software design and delivery.
  • Problem Solving: Skillfully identifying the root cause of in-life problems and employing expertise to quickly find solutions. Taking charge of the end-to-end problem-solving process and collaborating with stakeholders and the delivery team. Addressing production issues and documenting problem statements and solutions for future reference.
  • Change Management: Adapting to and contributing to changes or improvements in processes or technical practices. Operating effectively in a dynamic and challenging environment to enhance service quality and business value.
  • Software Development Concepts: Demonstrating familiarity with a wide range of programming concepts and applying various algorithms.
  • Technology Proficiency: Adeptness in areas like Data Management, Governance, Security, Solutions, Analysis, Process Automation, DevOps, File transfers, SFTP, FTPS, Scripting, Perl, Cloud storage, AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage.
Application Process for BT Recruitment 2023:

If you are interested and meet the eligibility criteria, you can submit your application for the position through the official website of BT as soon as possible.

Apply Now

item.content:encoded:
XenonStack Recruitment 2023 - XenonStack has planned to recruit individuals for the position of Associate ML Engineer - GET. This opportunity is open to B.E/B.Tech/M.E/M.Tech/B.Sc/M.Sc/BCA/MCA graduates. The comprehensive eligibility criteria and details regarding the application process are outlined below.

XenonStack Recruitment 2023 Details

Education

  • Technical Graduates (BCA, B.Sc, B.Tech), MCA, M.Sc, and M.Tech with a strong foundation in data structures and algorithms.

Experience

  • 0-1 years of experience (Interns with 2-3 impactful internship experiences are welcome).
Technical Requirements:
  • Proficiency in Machine Learning concepts and practices, or similar roles.
  • Familiarity with AWS or Azure cloud platforms.
  • Understanding of data structures, data modeling, and software architecture.
  • In-depth knowledge of mathematics, probability, statistics, and algorithms.
  • Ability to write robust code in programming languages like Python, Java, and R.
  • Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (e.g., Keras, PyTorch) and libraries (e.g., scikit-learn).
Professional Attributes:
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Strong attention to detail in tasks.
  • Possess analytical thinking and problem-solving aptitude.
  • Strong organizational skills to manage tasks efficiently.
  • Ability to think visually to solve complex problems.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Study and transform data science prototypes into practical solutions.
  • Design effective machine learning systems.
  • Research and implement suitable machine learning algorithms and tools.
  • Develop applications based on machine learning concepts to meet requirements.
  • Select relevant datasets and determine appropriate data representation methods.
  • Conduct machine learning tests and experiments to validate models.
How to Apply for XenonStack Recruitment 2023:

All interested and eligible candidates can apply for the Associate ML Engineer- GET position by following the online application link provided. If you are a technical graduate with a strong foundation in data structures and algorithms, and if you have experience or internships that have honed your skills, this could be a valuable opportunity for you. Demonstrating proficiency in machine learning concepts, cloud platforms, and programming languages, along with strong communication, analytical, and organizational skills, will be advantageous in this role.

This role offers a chance to work on transforming data science prototypes into real-world solutions, designing machine learning systems, and contributing to the implementation of machine learning algorithms. Running tests and experiments to validate models, selecting appropriate datasets, and developing applications are key responsibilities of the role. By following the provided application link, eligible candidates can apply and potentially join XenonStack's team of professionals in the exciting field of machine learning engineering.

Medtronic Recruitment 2023

item.title: Avaloq Off Campus Drive 2023 | Graduate Trainee | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Avaloq Off Campus Drive 2023: Avaloq Drive is conducting an Off Campus Recruitment event for candidates from the graduating batches of 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023. This recruitment process is open to candidates who hold a Bachelor's degree in any field. If you are keen on this opportunity, please submit your application at your earliest convenience, Apply Now.

Avaloq Off Campus Recruitment 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Avaloq Off Campus Drive 2023

Applicants must meet the following criteria to be eligible:

  1. Completed a minimum of 10+2+3 years of full-time education or 10+2+4 years of full-time education.
  2. Belong to the 2022 or 2023 batch of BSc/BE/B.Tech programs in fields such as Computer Science (CSC), Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Information Technology (IT), Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE), Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE), Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering (EIE), Electronics and Electrical Engineering (E&E), Applied Electronics, Computer and Technology, Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering (ETE), Instrumentation and Control Engineering (ICE), Software Engineering, Master of Computer Applications (MCA), or Master of Science (MSc).
  3. Possess outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
  4. Have achieved a first-class grade (60% or higher) in 10th, 12th, undergraduate (UG), and postgraduate (PG) courses, all of which must be full-time and regular.
  5. Should not have any pending arrears in their current educational program.
  6. Have a maximum gap of 2 years in their educational history.
  7. Freshers will be given preference.
Responsibility
  • Proficient in PL/SQL and Oracle with a solid foundation.
  • Possesses robust analytical, problem-solving, conceptual, and mathematical abilities.
  • Demonstrates a keen aptitude for fast learning.
Job Description

At Avaloq, we prioritize your professional growth. We're seeking reliable, recent engineering graduates to join us. As a fresh graduate engineer, your responsibilities include completing assigned tasks, supporting projects, conducting research, analyzing system flows and data usage, and following the agile software development lifecycle.

Here's a snapshot of our program:

  • You'll kickstart your journey with a 2-month bootcamp (Q3 2023 start date), offering insights into Avaloq's culture, technical skills, and building your professional network.
  • Following the bootcamp, you'll undergo a 10-month on-the-job training period under senior mentors, honing your creativity and problem-solving skills.
  • After successfully completing the training, you'll secure a permanent position with us.

As a Graduate Trainee, you'll collaborate across different divisions, enhancing your visibility within the organization. We offer dedicated training courses to boost your knowledge and experience.

We're seeking a dedicated Software Engineer to join our international team, working closely with technology vendors and infrastructure providers. Your role involves continuous technical and process improvements, considering both incremental and disruptive options.

What We Will Offer You

We operate on a hybrid work week model, granting our team members flexibility in their work arrangements while nurturing the unique Avaloq culture in our office spaces. Our base salaries are competitive, and exceptional performance can be rewarded with an extraordinary achievement bonus, the highest form of recognition. Avaloq is dedicated to sharing its success with all employees through "Success Share Units" based on annual performance.

At Avaloq, we celebrate diversity and fully embrace differences. We are deeply committed to providing equal employment opportunities and cultivating an inclusive environment where everyone's contributions are highly regarded, and their voices are heard. We hire, reward, and promote individuals without regard to their background, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other distinctive characteristics that set us apart. Please note that our job descriptions are intentionally crafted in an inclusive and gender-neutral language.

Apply Now

Sandvine Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Sandvine Off Campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria

Requirements for the position include:

  1. Possession of a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Engineering or Computer Science (or an equivalent qualification).
  2. Exceptional programming abilities and awareness, with a strong focus on C/C++ and Java (proficiency in at least two out of these three languages is required).

  2. Engage in software development on Sandvine's state-of-the-art platforms, fostering collaboration with our solution architects and other esteemed technical experts.
  3. Execute code that attains top-notch quality and exceptional performance standards.

item.title: TCS BPS Hiring 2023 | for Arts, Commerce & Science graduates | 2024 Batch | Across India | apply now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
TCS BPS Hiring 2023 : The TCS Off Campus Drive for the 2024 Batch Arts, Commerce, and Science graduates is planned as part of TCS BPS Hiring. You can find comprehensive information about eligibility criteria and the application procedure below.

TCS BPS Hiring 2023
Eligibility Criteria for TCS BPS Hiring 2023

Prospective applicants for the TCS Off Campus Drive for the 2024 Batch Arts, Commerce, and Science graduates through TCS BPS Hiring should note the following:

  1. Qualification: Candidates must be Full-Time Graduates holding degrees in B. Com, BA, BAF, BBI, BBA, BBM, BMS, BSc (Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Botany, Zoology) with an expected year of passing in 2024.
  2. Academic Backlog: It is permissible to have one active academic backlog at the time of the examination. However, this backlog must be cleared within the specified timeframe of the course.
  3. Education Gap: Any gaps or breaks in education must be disclosed in the TCS Application Form. The cumulative academic gap should not surpass 24 months, calculated up to the highest level of education. Relevant documentation as evidence of these gaps will be subject to verification.
  4. Work Environment: Candidates must be willing to work in a 24 x 7 work environment, including rotational night shifts, as necessitated by project requirements.
  5. Eligibility Verification: TCS will conduct eligibility checks at various stages of the selection process. If a student is discovered to be ineligible or has provided false information, their candidature will be invalidated.
  6. Experience: Since this role is designed for entry-level positions, previous work experience is not a prerequisite.

In essence, aspiring candidates for the TCS Off Campus Drive targeting 2024 Batch Arts, Commerce, and Science graduates via TCS BPS Hiring should adhere to these criteria and requirements.

About the Test

The examination will consist of 50 questions, and candidates will be given a total of 65 minutes to complete them.

Test Duration – 65 minutes

About TCS BPS Hiring for 2024 year of passing graduates

TCS BPS is inviting applications from 2024 graduating batch Arts, Commerce, and Science students to explore promising career prospects for fresh graduates.

TCS BPS: Established with the aim of identifying top-tier talent among the 2024 graduating class to support the organization's growth initiatives as outlined in its business strategy.

Outstanding achievers will have the opportunity to join TCS' rapidly expanding divisions in diverse positions that enhance their professional development.

Don't miss the chance to apply for the upcoming TCS BPS Hiring by September 20, 2023 (Wednesday).

Step by step procedure to apply for TCS BPS Hiring

If students wish to apply for TCS BPS Hiring, they must complete the mandatory registration process using the provided links below:

Certainly, here are the steps outlined in points with similar meanings:

  1. Step 1 : Access the TCS Next Step Portal through the provided link.
  2. Step 2 : Verification of Personal Details
  • It is crucial and mandatory to update the following information:
    • Aadhar Number
    • Full Name
    • Date of Birth, in accordance with your Aadhar Card.
  • It is essential to double-check and ensure that these details are accurate and free of errors before submission.
  • Providing incorrect information may result in the disqualification of your application.
  1. Step 3 : Registration for TCS BPS Hiring Process
  • Click on "Register Now" and select the category as 'BPS.'
  • Proceed to fill in your personal details in the form.
  • Once you have completed the form, review it, and make sure to click the "Submit" button to finalize your application.
Important Note

Certainly, here are the points rephrased with similar meanings:

  1. Ensure you have all your original academic documents, as required.
  2. All correspondence related to the test will be communicated to you through 'TCS iON – Our Test Provider.'
  3. TCS does not send job offers or any hiring-related communications from unauthorized email addresses such as Gmail, Rediff mail, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail, etc.
  4. TCS does not require candidates to make any monetary deposits for the recruitment process or job offers.
  5. TCS has no affiliations with external agencies or companies for conducting interviews or extending employment offers on its behalf.

Apply Now

item.title: Bajaj Allianz OFF campus Drive 2023 | Trainee Service Engineer | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Bajaj Allianz off campus drive 2023 : Bajaj Allianz Drive is hosting a recruitment event for individuals from the graduating classes of 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023 as part of their hiring process. They are inviting candidates with bachelor's degrees in any field to submit their applications for this recruitment drive. If this opportunity aligns with your interests, we encourage you to promptly submit your application.

Bajaj Allianz off campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Bajaj Allianz off campus Drive 2023
Eligibility Criteria
  • Possession of a bachelor's degree or diploma in engineering or technology, with a specialization in the automobile or mechanical field (Even final year students are eligible to apply).
  • Proven capacity to maintain relationships with both internal and external clients.
  • Outstanding oral and written communication capabilities.
  • Self-directed, exceptionally driven, and self-assured.
  • Capable of performing effectively within tight deadlines in a dynamic and fast-paced setting.
  • Robust analytical and issue-solving abilities.
  • Valuable team player.
  • Attentive to details.
  • Adept in fundamental computer skills.
Role
  • Determine liability for the damages
  • Interview customers and other parties involved
  • Partner with repairers/advisors to manage vehicle repairs
  • Negotiate with customers and other service providers
Responsibility
  • Create, build, maintain, deploy, and test technology solutions that are robust, albeit on a smaller scale.
  • Operate with minimal oversight and direction, utilizing strong engineering expertise, tools, methodologies, and approaches in all project deliverables.
  • Grasp the software requisites encompassing multiple stories within an epic and ensure their transformation into high-quality, production-ready code, aligned with the high-level design.
  • Comprehend the well-defined project scope and deadlines, delivering top-notch outputs within the estimated timeframe.
  • Actively engage in team events and take on a mentoring role for fellow Software Development Engineers in Test (SDET).
Job Description

As a trainee in the role of a service engineer, you will acquire the skills necessary to assist customers in getting their vehicles back on the road following accidents. In a dynamic office setting, you will primarily cultivate customer relationships via telephone interactions. You will be trained to effectively handle a large number of insurance claims, overseeing the entire claims process from initiation to completion. Bring your passion for assisting others to our team, and we will provide you with the expertise needed in the realm of motor insurance. If you're seeking a departure from the conventional and aspire to join an innovative claims organization at the forefront of technological advancements, we are eager to engage with you!

During Training you will learn
  • Fundamental principles of General Insurance in the Indian context.
  • In-depth exploration of Motor Insurance products and an extensive examination of the procedures involved in handling insurance claims.
  • Comprehensive understanding of automobile structures, advanced technologies, Body & Paint techniques, and collision repair technology.
  • Techniques for assessing and negotiating settlements for auto accident claims to ensure fairness and equity.
  • Proficiency in deciphering policy contracts and determining how coverage applies to specific losses.
  • Accurate and thorough documentation of files, encompassing all essential claims-related activities.
  • Strategies for resolving both internal and external customer inquiries effectively.
  • Collaborative approaches for working with external partners to guarantee that our customers receive efficient and proficient service at a high standard.

Apply Now

item.title: Capillary Recruitment 2023 | Data Science Associate | Fresher
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Capillary Recruitment 2023 - Capillary Drive is currently conducting recruitment for candidates from the 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023 graduating batches. Individuals holding a bachelor's degree in any field are welcome to submit their applications for the recruitment process. If you have an interest in this opportunity, please ensure to apply at your earliest convenience.

Capillary Recruitment 2023 Details
Job Responsibilities

The associate's primary role involves aiding the data science department in uncovering valuable insights, constructing predictive models, and formulating practical suggestions based on intricate data collections. Collaborative efforts with senior data scientists, data engineers, and various stakeholders will be crucial in enhancing data-centric decision-making procedures.

Requirements
  1. Hold a bachelor's degree in a related area (e.g., Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science).
  2. Possess proficiency in programming languages like Python or R.
  3. Display a fundamental grasp of machine learning algorithms and statistical concepts.
  4. Familiarity with data manipulation libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy) and visualization tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn).
  5. Demonstrate strong aptitude for problem-solving and meticulousness.
  6. Exhibit effective communication and teamwork skills.
Job Requirements
  1. Proficiency in Programming Languages (Python/R): Mastery of programming languages such as Python or R is imperative for data manipulation, analysis, and model creation. These languages provide the necessary tools and libraries for diverse data science tasks.
  2. Data Cleaning and Analysis Proficiency: The capacity to cleanse, preprocess, and scrutinize data forms the foundation of data science. Proficiency in Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) aids in the discovery of valuable insights and patterns that steer decision-making.
  3. Machine Learning Acumen: A comprehensive understanding of machine learning concepts, algorithms, and methodologies is indispensable for crafting predictive models and shaping data-oriented decisions.
  4. Competence in Data Visualization: Proficiency in data visualization equips you to articulate intricate findings in a lucid and comprehensible manner, thereby facilitating enhanced comprehension and decision-making.
  5. Strong Problem-Solving and Analytical Abilities: Robust problem-solving skills enable you to systematically tackle challenges, construct hypotheses, design experiments, and draw substantial conclusions from data.

Apply Now

item.title: Wipro Recruitment 2023 | Test Engineer | Apply now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Wipro Recruitment 2023 : Wipro has plans to recruit a Test Engineer, specifically targeting individuals with B.E/B.Tech/MCA degrees. The comprehensive requirements for eligibility and the procedure for applying are outlined as follows in intricate detail.

Wipro Recruitment 2023
Eligibility Criteria for Wipro Recruitment 2023

Education Qualification

Applicants must hold qualifications in the form of B.E, B.Tech, or MCA degrees.

Role Purpose

The main objective of this position is to create test scenarios and thoroughly evaluate the product, platform, or solution intended for client deployment, ensuring that it adheres to the highest quality assurance standards without any compromises.

Instrumental in understanding the test requirements and testcase design of the product

  • Validating test cases through peer reviews to minimize the need for rework.
  • Collaborating with the development team to identify and document test cases while ensuring version control.
  • Defining testing parameters, criteria, and the scope of testing, including involvement in User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
  • Automating various stages of the test life cycle using methods such as VB macros, scheduling, and GUI automation for enhanced efficiency.

To design and execute the automation framework and reporting

  • Create and automate software validation tests, including test environment setup, test plan development, and test case/scenario creation.
  • Ensure that reported test defects align with project/program/account standards and include clear descriptions and replication steps.
  • Identify and document software issues, preparing defect reports, and tracking test progress.
  • Avoid any rejections or delivery delays of completed work items, staying within Wipro/Customer SLA guidelines.
  • Design and timely share a test status dashboard after each test cycle with stakeholders.
  • Offer feedback on usability and serviceability, link results to quality risks, and report them to relevant stakeholders.

Status Reporting and Customer Focus on an ongoing basis with respect to testing and its execution

  • Maintain a high standard of customer communication quality, including email content, tracking fault reports, voice calls, and adherence to business etiquette.
  • Ensure punctual delivery of WSRs (Weekly Status Reports), Test Execution Reports, and updates in the Test Management repository.
  • Accurately record and update effort information in eCube, TMS (Test Management System), and other project-related tracking tools.
  • Provide timely responses to customer inquiries and avoid any instances of complaints, whether originating internally or externally.
Functional Competencies/ Skill

Utilizing Technology Proficiency – Demonstrating familiarity with present and forthcoming technologies, including automation, tools, and systems, to enhance efficiency and effectiveness within one's role and the client organization – Competent

Process Excellence – Exhibiting the capability to adhere to established standards and norms consistently, ensuring the production of reliable outcomes, effective control, and risk reduction – Expert

Technical Expertise – Possessing extensive knowledge of diverse testing tools, automation tools, customization, and their practical application within the client's context – Expert

Behavioural Competencies
  • Formulation & Prioritization
  • Client centricity
  • Execution Excellence
  • Passion for Results
  • Confidence

item.title: Gainsight Recruitment 2023 | Associate Software Engineer
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Gainsight Recruitment 2023 for the position of Associate Software Engineer. Individuals who hold a B.E, B.Tech, or MCA degree are eligible to submit their applications for this job opportunity. If you are interested and meet the eligibility criteria, you can complete the application process via the online platform. A comprehensive breakdown of the eligibility requirements and the selection procedure is provided in the following sections..

Gainsight Recruitment 2023 for Associate Software Engineer
Job Summary

In the role of an Associate Software Engineer, your primary responsibility will be to collaborate closely with the Engineering, Product, and Design teams within an empowered product group. Your tasks will involve the complete product development lifecycle, starting from conceptualization to final delivery. We are looking for individuals who have received formal education or training in fields related to Software Engineering or Computer Science and are enthusiastic about fast-paced learning and personal growth.

Qualifications
  • Strong fundamental skills in programming and software engineering.
  • Effective communication abilities.
  • An innate curiosity and a keen appetite for continuous learning, constantly seeking avenues for personal development and product enhancement.
  • High coachability and a strong drive for self-improvement.
  • A genuine passion for solving challenges through software, viewing it as more of a personal interest than just a profession.
  • While you benefit from guidance, you don't necessitate constant supervision; you are an independent, proactive individual capable of identifying and addressing opportunities.
Responsibilities
  1. Crafting and developing software solutions within a designated product domain.
  2. Offering valuable insights and recommendations to enhance existing processes and methodologies.
  3. Absorbing knowledge from constructive feedback provided by more experienced engineers.
  4. Committing to continuous learning and personal growth, constantly striving to evolve into a more proficient engineer.
Tech Responsibilities

Applicants are not required to possess prior experience with our technology stack, but a strong willingness to acquire the necessary skills is crucial. Here is an overview of the tools and technologies you will engage with in this role:

  • Application: You will work with React and Ruby on Rails.
  • Programming Language: Proficiency in Ruby is essential.
  • Cloud Platform: Familiarity with AWS, Kubernetes, and Kafka is required.
  • Infrastructure Automation: Experience with Terraform is expected.
  • Databases: You will be working with PostgreSQL (RDS), Redis, and Snowflake.
  • Build and Deployment Pipeline: Utilization of Github and Github Actions is part of the process.
  • Monitoring and Debugging: The use of Datadog and Sentry.io is integral for monitoring and debugging tasks.
Why You’ll Love It Here

Your job shouldn’t stand in the way of your happiness—it should be a path to achieve it. At Gainsight, we’re passionate about achieving our goals—at the office and everywhere—and we work every day to create an environment that nurtures our best selves.

Gainsters love working here for several reasons. Here are a few:

  • Our Core Values: We are guided by our values on our mission to be living proof you can win in business while being human-first.
  • Our CEO: With a 99% approval rating on Glassdoor, Nick Mehta is one of the most beloved CEOs in Silicon Valley. 
  • Our Growth Opportunities: From mentoring to career development opportunities, we’re passionate about helping our Gainsters learn, grow and thrive.
  • Our Teammate Resource Groups: A huge source of pride for Gainsight, these groups are on a mission to put our values into action and make Gainsight a great place to work for all.
  • Our Wellness Priorities: Monthly Recharge Days that re-energize us.

By joining the Gainsight team, you’ll have a unique opportunity to make your mark at a truly human-first company and have loads of fun doing it. Come join us!

item.title: Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023 | For ASE and SASA Role | All Details
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023, Discover the key insights into Accenture's offline exam syllabus in our comprehensive article. Uncover the topics and areas you need to focus on to excel in Accenture's recruitment process.

Are you aspiring to join Accenture, one of the world's leading consulting and technology services companies? If so, it's crucial to understand the assessment process that can determine your candidacy. Accenture employs a multi-stage assessment process, including mock assessments, to evaluate candidates for various roles. In this article, we will provide you with a detailed overview of the Accenture mock assessments, what they entail, and why they are important in your recruitment journey.

Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023

Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023, This table provides a comprehensive overview of each assessment round, emphasising their significance in the Accenture selection process and offering key tips for success.

Mock Assessment Overview

Before diving into the specifics of each assessment, let's first understand the purpose and significance of the mock assessment.

Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023 Purpose of Mock Assessment

The mock assessment serves several important purposes:

  1. Technical Compatibility: It ensures that candidates have the appropriate hardware, software, and internet connectivity to participate in the online assessments effectively.
  2. Experience: It provides candidates with a hands-on experience of the assessment format, helping them become more comfortable and confident during the actual assessments.

Now that we understand the importance of the mock assessment, let's delve into the details of each assessment component.

Assessment #1: Cognitive Assessment

Duration: 50 minutes

Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023 Components:

  • English Ability: Evaluate your proficiency in the English language.
  • Critical Thinking and Problem Solving: Assess your ability to analyze and solve complex problems.
  • Abstract Reasoning: Measure your aptitude for abstract thinking.

Result Notification: You will receive your cognitive assessment results within 5-10 minutes after completing the assessment. It is advised to remain seated and await the result.

Assessment #2: Technical Assessment

Duration: 40 minutes

Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023 Components:

  • Common Application and MS Office: Test your knowledge of commonly used software applications.
  • Pseudocode: Assess your understanding of algorithmic thinking.
  • Fundamentals of Networking and Security: Evaluate your grasp of networking concepts and security fundamentals
  • Fundamentals of Cloud: Gauge your knowledge of cloud computing principles.
Assessment #3: Communication Assessment

Duration: Approximately 30 minutes

Candidates will receive a separate email with timelines and login details to participate in this assessment. The communication assessment will evaluate you on the following parameters:

  • Sentence Mastery: Assess your ability to construct grammatically correct sentences.
  • Vocabulary: Measure your vocabulary range and usage.
  • Fluency: Evaluate how smoothly and naturally you communicate.
  • Pronunciation: Assess your clarity in pronouncing words.

Mastering these communication skills is essential, as effective communication is a key requirement for many roles at Accenture.

Assessment #4: Coding Round ( Only For ASE Role )

If you've successfully navigated through the initial assessments, it's time to gear up for the next challenge - the Coding Round. While this round is officially a non-elimination stage, recent trends suggest that its importance cannot be understated. In some instances, candidates have faced rejection even after attempting just one question. Therefore, treat it as if your progress in the selection process depends on it, because it very well might.

The Coding Round: What You Need to Know

Mandatory Participation: The Coding Round is mandatory. You must participate in it to continue in the selection process.

Two Coding Questions: You'll be presented with two coding questions to solve. The complexity of these questions is generally in the medium range, but the exact difficulty may vary based on your proficiency in coding.

Time Allotted: You'll have a total of 45 minutes to complete both coding questions. Time management is key to success in this round.

Language Selection: Accenture provides candidates with the option to code in the following programming languages: C, C++, Java, Python, and .Net. Choose the language you are most comfortable with and proficient in.

Preparing for Success : Accenture Offline Exam Syllabus 2023

To excel in the Coding Round, you should:

  1. Practice, Practice, Practice: Efficient coding skills are a must. Regular practice on coding platforms, solving problems, and understanding algorithms is essential.
  2. Understand Data Structures and Algorithms: Brush up on your knowledge of data structures and algorithms. Many coding questions revolve around these concepts.
  3. Time Management: Given the limited time, learn to manage it wisely. If you get stuck on one question, it might affect your performance on the other.
  4. Debugging Skills: Being able to identify and fix errors in your code is as important as writing the code itself. Debugging skills can be a game-changer.
  5. Use Online Coding Platforms: Utilize online coding platforms like LeetCode, HackerRank, or Codeforces to practice coding problems similar to what you might encounter in this round.
  6. Read the Question Carefully: Before you start coding, thoroughly understand the problem statement. A clear understanding is half the solution.

Do Watch This Video

item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
TCS Sigma Hiring 2024 Batch, specifically targeting Pharma graduates from the 2024 batch. You can find all the details regarding eligibility criteria and how to apply below.

TCS Sigma Hiring 2024 batch

Eligibility Criteria for TCS Sigma Hiring 2024 batch

  1. Graduates in B. Pharmacy/M. Pharmacy with a 2024 Year of Passing are eligible to apply on a full-time basis.
  2. Candidates should have only one active backlog at the time of the exam, and it must be cleared within the stipulated time duration of the course.
  3. Declaration of any gaps in education is mandatory in the TCS Application Form. The cumulative academic gap should not exceed 24 months until the highest qualification. Documentary proof for any gaps in education will be verified.
  4. Applicants must be willing to work in a 24 x 7 work environment, including rotational night shifts based on project requirements.
  5. TCS will conduct eligibility checks at various stages of the selection process. Any ineligibility or misrepresentation of information will result in disqualification.
  6. Since this position is for entry-level requirements, prior work experience is not expected from the candidates.
About TCS Sigma Hiring 2024 batch

TCS Sigma Hiring is welcoming applications from the 2024 batch of Pharmacy graduates and postgraduates, providing them with an opportunity to embark on an exciting career journey. The program is strategically crafted to identify and recruit the most promising fresh talent in the country, aligning with TCS' growth plans. The aim is to nurture exceptional performers who will contribute to the rapid expansion of TCS, placing them in diverse and rewarding roles that will significantly enhance their career progression. It's a gateway for aspiring individuals to join TCS and be part of its fastest-growing units.

The examination consists of 80 questions, and candidates are allotted 140 minutes to provide their answers.

To apply for TCS Sigma Hiring 2024 Batch , follow these steps:

Step 1: Access the TCS Next Step Portal.

Step 2: Verify your details.

  • Ensure accurate information in line with your Aadhar Card.
  • Any discrepancies may result in disqualification.

Step 3: Registration for TCS Sigma Hiring.

  • Click on "Register Now" and select the category as 'BPS.'
  • Complete the form with your details and review it before submission.
  • Click "Submit" to finalize your application.

Important Note:

  • Keep your original academic documents handy.
  • All test-related communications will be conveyed by 'TCS iON – Our Test Provider.

Apply Now

Revolut Hiring Freshers 2023 Details

Revolut Hiring Freshers 2023 - Job Description

Ensuring our users have an exceptional customer experience is integral to our mission of instilling a sense of security in Revolut users throughout their service usage. Delivering top-notch customer service through our in-app live chat, phone, and email is a priority. Upholding the reputation of Revolut is a constant responsibility in online interactions.   3. Exceptional communication abilities
  4. Capability to simplify intricate issues for easy comprehension
  5. Strong writing skills, along with excellent numeracy and IT proficiency
  6. Keen attention to detail and analytical prowess
  7. Empathetic nature and a passion for assisting others
  8. Display a motivated, self-driven, and highly adaptable team-oriented approach
  9. Inherent ability as a self-directed learner with an independent problem-solving mindset
  10. Previous experience in customer support
  11. Maintain a stable, swift, and dependable home internet connection
About the Position : Revolut Hiring Freshers 2023
  1. Team Representation:
    • The Customer Support Team serves as the public face of our company, offering top-notch front-line support to our extensive customer base.
    • Internal customer-champions collaborating with product teams to ensure user-centricity in all aspects of Revolut's initiatives.
  2. Role Overview:
    • Seeking individuals with exceptional customer support skills for the position of Support Specialist.
    • Emphasis on delivering exceptional service, going beyond routine ticket handling and quick call responses.

    • Compensation provided for night shifts.

    • Acknowledgment that the role may not suit everyone due to unconventional working hours.

In essence, we're not just seeking team members; we're looking for individuals committed to creating outstanding customer experiences, ready to adapt to the dynamic nature of our global financial services environment.

About the Company:
  1. Mission and Vision:
    • Founded in 2015, Revolut is driven by the mission to provide individuals with more from their money—more visibility, control, and freedom.
  2. Product Range:
    • Offers a diverse array of products covering spending, saving, travel, transfers, investing, exchanging, and more through its super app.
    • Aims to empower over 30 million customers to maximize the potential of their finances.
  3. Continuous Evolution:
    • Committed to ongoing growth and development, with no intentions of slowing down.
  4. Key Factors for Success:
    • Identifies people and culture as fundamental pillars for sustained success.
    • Currently boasts a team of over 6000 individuals globally, working either from offices or remotely.
  5. Global Presence:
    • Operates on a global scale, with a distributed workforce contributing to its mission.
  6. Expansion Plans:
    • Continues to seek exceptional individuals to join the mission of building innovative products.
  7. Cultural Emphasis:
    • Values brilliant minds passionate about crafting exceptional products.
    • Thrives on redefining success and simplifying the complexities of a chaotic world into elegant solutions.

item.content:encoded:
Programmers.IO Is Hiring Freshers For Software Engineer Role From a full-time degree in BCA, MCA, MSC (CS/IT), or B. Tech/M. Tech in Computer Science, IT, Electronics, or any engineering stream, and you're graduating in 2023 or 2024, we invite fresh graduates or those with 0 years of software development experience to apply.

Programmers.IO Is Hiring Freshers Details
Programmers.IO Is Hiring Freshers - Job Description
  1. Eligible candidates should possess a full-time degree in BCA, MCA, or MSC (CS/IT), or alternatively, a B. Tech/M. Tech in Computer Science, IT, Electronics and communication, or any engineering discipline.
  2. The prospective candidates must anticipate graduating in either 2023 or 2024.
  3. This opportunity is open to both fresh graduates and individuals with 0-2 years of experience in software development.
  4. Candidates are expected to demonstrate strong analytical and logical thinking skills.
  5. The ability to swiftly learn and contribute to a team is a crucial attribute we seek in applicants.
  6. An eagerness to work across various technologies, coupled with a solid foundation of knowledge and interest, is highly valued.
  7. Excellent verbal and written communication skills are essential for effective collaboration within the team.
  8. Proficiency in at least one programming language is a prerequisite for consideration.

Selection Process Programmers.IO Is Hiring Freshers

The selection process comprises four key stages:

  1. Online Aptitude Test: Candidates will undergo an initial assessment to evaluate their general aptitude. This test aims to gauge their quantitative, verbal, and logical reasoning skills.
  2. Coding Round (Online): Successful candidates from the aptitude test will move on to a coding round conducted online. This segment assesses their programming proficiency and problem-solving abilities.
  3. Technical Interview (Online): Those who perform well in the coding round will face a technical interview online. This interview delves deeper into their understanding of technical concepts, problem-solving approaches, and evaluates their overall technical competence.
  4. Manager/HR Final Round (Online): The final stage involves a round with managerial or HR representatives. This session focuses on assessing the candidate's fit within the organizational culture, their interpersonal skills, and their ability to contribute effectively to the team.

This multi-tiered selection process is designed to comprehensively evaluate candidates, ensuring that those selected not only possess the necessary technical skills but also align with the company's values and culture.

Join us on a thrilling journey in the realm of software engineering! We're actively seeking passionate individuals ready to embark on a path of continuous learning and professional development. Your exciting future in software engineering awaits!

Siemens Healthineers Off Campus Drive 2023 Details

  1. Applicants must be pursuing B.E/B.Tech/MCA with a specialization in Computer Science Engineering or Circuital branches and are expected to graduate in 2024.
  2. A minimum CGPA of 6.5 and above is required for consideration.
  3. Prospective candidates should not possess any active backlogs at the time of application.

Job Responsibilities:

  1. Play a key role in developing cutting-edge technology prototypes, actively contributing to various innovation streams.
  2. Actively participate in the software design process to create optimal solutions for our product offerings.
  3. Take charge of implementing features while upholding the highest coding and quality standards.
  4. Create and review relevant specifications, ensuring adherence to defined processes throughout the development lifecycle.

  3. Technical Round 1: Successful test participants will engage in the first technical round on October 19, 2023, where their technical capabilities will be further evaluated.
  4. Managerial Round 20: Those progressing through the technical round will face a managerial interview on October 20, 2023.
  5. Result Declaration: The final results of the recruitment process will be announced on October 23, 2023, concluding the selection procedure.

Summery

In this role, you'll be at the forefront of technological innovation, contributing to the development of state-of-the-art prototypes and ensuring optimal solutions in software design. Your responsibilities include implementing features with high coding and quality standards, participating in specification creation, and applying agile methodologies like Test-Driven Development. Familiarity with software engineering processes and a strong grasp of OOPS, design principles, and data structures are crucial. This position not only demands technical prowess but also active involvement in the innovation process. If you're passionate about cutting-edge technology and software engineering, this role is a perfect fit. The recruitment process involves CV shortlisting, an online test, technical and managerial rounds, with results declared by October 23, 2023.

item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Zycus Off Campus Drive 2023 For The Software Developer Role From 2020 to 2023 Batch Fresher Students. All The Details Are Given Below

Zycus Off Campus Drive 2023
About Us

Zycus is a pioneer in Cognitive Procurement software and has been a trusted partner of choice for large global enterprises for two decades. Zycus has been consistently recognized by Gartner, Forrester, and other analysts for its Source to Pay integrated suite. Zycus powers its S2P software with the revolutionary Merlin AI Suite. Merlin AI takes over the tactical tasks and empowers procurement and AP officers to focus on strategic projects; offers data-driven actionable insights for quicker and smarter decisions, and its conversational AI offers a B2C type user-experience to the end-users.

Zycus helps enterprises drive real savings, reduce risks, and boost compliance, and its seamless, intuitive, and easy-to-use user interface ensures high adoption and value across the organization.

Job Description : Zycus Off Campus Drive 2023

Zycus is looking for an Angular Developer, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include implementing visual elements and their behavior with user interactions. You will work with both front-end and back-end web developers to build all client-side logic. You will also be bridging the gap between the visual elements and the server-side infrastructure, taking an active role on both sides, and defining how the application looks and functions. We are looking for candidates who want to start their career in frontend Angular, JavaScript or CoffeeScript, HTML5, CSS3, jquery, ajax. If you are looking for a frontend /Angular developer role then you could be the best fit for the role!

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Designing and developing user interfaces using Angular
  • Writing JavaScript, CSS, and HTML
  • Developing application codes and unit testing
  • Conducting performance tests
  • Understand Source code management
  • Understanding the flow of code and how it interacts with different components
  • Understanding design documents, requirements, and product objectives

Job Requirement : Zycus Off Campus Drive 2023

Requirements:

  • A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
  • Experience: 0-1 years (Fresher- ONLY 2020, 2021 and 2022 PASSOUTS)
  • Excellent designing and programming skills.
  • Knowledge of programming languages and process management methodology.
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript, object-oriented JS, its quirks, and workarounds
  • Good understanding of server-side CSS preprocessors such as Stylus, Less
  • Basic understanding of web markup, including HTML5 and CSS3
  • Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, JQuery, and AJAX
  • Good analytical skills and an innovative mind.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Good time management and organizational skills.
  • The ability to keep current with the constantly changing technology industry.
  • A passion for development, and design.

Five Reasons Why You Should Join Zycus

  1. Cloud Product Company: We are a Cloud SaaS Company and our products are created by using the latest technologies like ML and AI. Our UI is in Angular and we are developing our mobile apps using React.
  2. A Market Leader: Zycus is recognized by Gartner (world’s leading market research analyst) as a Leader in Procurement Software Suites.
  3. Move between Roles: We believe that change leads to growth and therefore we allow our employees to shift careers and move to different roles and functions within the organization
  4. Get a Global Exposure: You get to work and deal with our global customers.
  5. Create an Impact: Zycus gives you the environment to create an impact on the product and transform your ideas into reality. Even our junior engineers get the opportunity to work on different product features.

Apply Now
