item.title: XaCtly Hiring Freshers 2024 | Intern Role | All Details
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
XaCtly Hiring Freshers Are you a recent graduate with a technical degree looking for an exciting opportunity? XaCtly is offering a full-time Intern Database position in Bangalore. Minimal travel is required for this role, allowing you to focus on your career development. If you hold any technical degree, this could be the perfect chance to gain valuable experience. Don't miss out on this opportunity – apply now for the Intern - Database role at XaCtly and kickstart your career!

XaCtly Hiring Freshers

Job Title: Database Intern

Opportunity Overview: XaCtly Hiring Freshers

As a Database Intern at Xactly Corporation, your responsibilities will encompass the installation, configuration, and maintenance of both relational and non-relational databases, along with the management of our all-flash storage infrastructure supporting these databases. This role involves the day-to-day management and support of multiple production, staging, and development environments. Working as part of the Operations team, you will play a crucial role in maintaining Xactly's infrastructure, collaborating closely with the Support, Development, and Quality Engineering (QE) teams to diagnose and resolve database, application, and performance-related issues.

Xactly values diversity and believes that unique perspectives and backgrounds contribute to innovation and creativity. This inclusive approach strengthens our relationships with customers worldwide, representing different cultures and experiences.

The Team: XaCtly Hiring Freshers

Xactly's Data-platform team is a globally dispersed, highly skilled, and close-knit group with diverse backgrounds and expertise. We recognize that individuals have different work styles, and we strive to foster a flexible and open environment that allows you to establish a work-life balance that suits you best.

The Skill Set: XaCtly Hiring Freshers

  • Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science or related field.
  • 0-1 year of professional experience as an Oracle DBA with a strong academic record OR recent graduates with excellent academic records and completion of professional courses/certifications in Oracle DBA.
  • Strong analytical and learning abilities.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Willingness to participate in on-call rotations to support production systems.
  • Adaptability in a constantly changing environment.
  • Collaborative team player willing to assist peers.

Responsibilities Timeline:

Within One Month: XaCtly Hiring Freshers

  • Familiarize yourself with our Database and Application architecture.
  • Get involved in our monthly release cycle for our application and infrastructure.

Within Three Months:

  • Become proficient in providing Business As Usual (BAU) support and participate in on-call rotations for our production environments.
  • Gain in-depth knowledge of various relational and non-relational databases and applications used at Xactly.

Within Six Months:

  • Lead database team projects and proof of concepts (POCs) on Xactly's on-premise and cloud infrastructure.
  • Contribute to continuous improvement efforts, optimizing and automating regular operations.

Within Twelve Months:

  • Take charge of database-related projects with cross-functional teams and play a role in strategic planning, development, and implementation of new initiatives driving company growth.

The Xactly Story: XaCtly Hiring Freshers

Xactly is a leading provider of enterprise-class, cloud-based incentive compensation solutions for employee and sales performance management. We address a critical business need by aligning employee behaviors with company goals through incentives. Our solutions empower organizations to make informed strategic decisions, enhance sales and employee performance, increase efficiency, and mitigate risk. We design innovative incentive compensation plans, reduce error rates in compensation calculations, and enable organizations to thrive in a competitive business landscape.

Apply Now

item.title: NVIDIA Off Campus Drive 2024 | Graduate Trainee | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
NVIDIA Off Campus Drive 2024 brings an exciting opportunity for aspiring engineers with the role of Engineer-New College Graduate (NCG). If you hold a B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech/MS degree and are part of the 2024 batch, this is your chance to embark on a fulfilling career journey. Freshers are welcome, and the impressive compensation package ranges from Rs 26 to 29 LPA. The job locations span across India, offering a diverse range of opportunities. The test for this drive is scheduled for February 4, 2024, and the last date to apply is February 2, 2024. Don't miss the chance to be a part of NVIDIA's team – apply now and pave the way for a successful career in engineering!

NVIDIA Off Campus Drive 2024

Detailed Eligibility:

Qualification:

  • Students of B.Tech/ Dual degree/ M.Tech/ MS from CS/ EE/ EC Departments, graduating in 2024.
  • CGPA of 6 and above

CTC:

  • CTC for B.Techs: 26 LPA
  • CTC for M.Techs: 29 LPA
About N.Ex.T – NVIDIA Exceptional Talent 2024:
  • N.Ex.T (NVIDIA Exceptional Talent) is an unparalleled program designed to recruit outstanding engineering graduates nationwide. Our primary objective is to attract the most brilliant minds to join NVIDIA, offering them an extraordinary platform to excel and accomplish their greatest professional achievements alongside us.
  • N.Ex.T focuses on simplifying and democratizing an otherwise hard-to-find job opportunity. Designed in true NVIDIAN spirit, it’s innovative and inclusive.
  • This year marks our third edition of the program, and we’re eager to hire engineers who are passionate about working on world-changing products and driven to improve the quality of life for people everywhere.

Rules:

  • Participation in the event is subject to the sole discretion of the organization.
  • The organizer reserves the right to determine the final decision.
  • Any case of cheating will result in disqualification from the event.
  • Only candidates who clear N.Ex.T Basic followed by N.Ex.T Advanced assessment will be eligible for Interviews.
Selection Process:
  • Two rounds of online technical tests – N.Ex.T Basic followed by N.Ex.T Advanced for candidates who meet eligiblity criteria.
  • Candidates who clear both tests will go through two rounds of panel interviews.
  • Selected candidates will be offered a full-time New College Graduate (NCG) position in the Hardware Engineering group at NVIDIA India.

Apply Now

item.title: TATA Steel Recruitment 2024 | Junior Engineer | Apply Now
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
TATA Steel Recruitment 2024 opens doors for aspiring engineers with the position of Junior Engineer Trainee. If you hold a Diploma/BE/BTech/ME/MTech and belong to the batches of 2024, 2023, 2022, or 2021, this is a remarkable opportunity to launch your career. No prior experience is required, making it accessible to fresh graduates. During the training period, the stipend is set at Rs 16,531 per month for the first year, and post that, the salary ranges from 3 to 4 LPA. This opportunity spans across India, providing a wide range of possibilities. The test is scheduled for February 18, 2024, and the application deadline is January 19, 2024. Graduates in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation, Metallurgy, Ceramic, Chemical, or Civil Engineering are encouraged to apply. Seize this chance with TATA Steel and apply now for the role of Junior Engineer Trainee!

TATA Steel Recruitment 2024
About Tata Steel Company: TATA Steel Recruitment 2024

Tata Steel Limited is a multinational steel-making company and a part of the Tata Group, one of India’s largest and oldest conglomerates. Tata Steel was established by Jamsetji Tata in 1907 as Asia’s first integrated private sector steel company. The company’s first steel plant was set up in Jamshedpur, India, which is still one of its primary manufacturing locations.

Tata Steel is a global steel producer with operations in various countries, including India, the United Kingdom, Netherlands, Singapore, Thailand, and Australia. The company has a significant presence in Europe, especially after acquiring Corus Group (formerly British Steel) in 2007, making Tata Steel one of the largest steel producers in Europe.

Eligibility Criteria of TATA Steel Junior Engineer Trainee Job 2024:
  • Passing Out Batch:– 2024,2023,2022,2021
  • Degree Required:– Diploma/BE/BTech/ME/MTech
  • Branch Required:– Mechanical / Electrical / Electronics / Instrumentation / Metallurgy / Ceramic / Chemical / Civil Engineering
  • Percentage Criteria:– For General Candidates: Male: Minimum 60% (aggregate) For Female: Minimum 55% (aggregate) For ST / SC Community: Minimum 50% (aggregate)
  • Age Limit:–  Between January 1, 1999, and January 1, 2007 (both days inclusive)

Note: Duration of training is 12 Months after that selected candidates will received a full time offer.

TATA Steel Jet (Junior Engineer Trainee) Salary Details:
  • The candidates undergoing training will be paid 16531 during their training period. Free hostel accommodation with food (at subsidized rates) will be provided to the eligible candidates, during the period of training only
  • After 12 months Training Selected Candidate will received a full time offer
Important Dates for TATA Steel Recruitment 2024:
  • On-line application will be open from 8th January 2024 to 19th January 2024.
  • Admit Card will be released on 12th February 2024.
  • Centre Based Online Written Test will be conducted on 18th February 2024.
Selection Process for TATA Steel JET (Junior Engineer Trainee) 2024:

Tata steel Selection Process, Recruitment Process will consist of 3 Steps.

1) Centre Based Online Written Test (Aptitude/English/Reasoning Questions)
2) Personal Interview
3) Medical Examination.

How to Apply for TATA Steel Junior Engineer Trainee Recruitment 2024:
  • Log in to https://www.tatasteel.com/careers/ then click on “Apply for jobs/internship” tab.
  • Click on Application tab for registration / online application link.
  • For registration, please use below link: Click Here
  • After registration, please fill the application form using the below link: Click Here
  • For Application related query connect helpdesk Email Id: snti.recruit@tatasteel.com
  • To download the Admit Card for the assessment, click on the link given below: https://cdn.digialm.com//EForms/configuredHtml/31595/87406/login.htm

item.title: Deloitte new Hiring 2024 | Engineering & MCA | Freshers Can Apply
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Deloitte New Hiring 2024 – Deloitte is scheduled to hire an Analyst-Trainee for Engineer Graduates & Associate Analyst for B.Sc/BCA students. The detailed eligibility and application process are given below.

Deloitte New Hiring 2024
Analyst Trainee - Job Description

Are you a quick learner with a willingness to work with new technologies? Do you have an analytical mindset? At Deloitte, we deliver solutions to global clients who are pioneers in the field of technology. Here, innovative practices are designed through world-class service.

Analyst trainees at Deloitte are expected to develop strong technical skills in the system/ technology area they work in. As a part of the project onboarding process, you are provided with training/awareness aimed at building proficiency in the role. It involves the development of technical and behavioral skills as per defined proficiency levels (as per the Expectation Framework), understanding of the organization-specific tools and methodologies, and focused capability building on communication excellence as per Deloitte standards.

Qualifications Required : Deloitte New Hiring 2024
Eligible Academics
  • The year of graduation should be 2024
  • Aggregate 60% or equivalent CGPA of 6.5 and above
Eligible Degrees and Branches
  • Bachelor of Technology/Engineering (B.Tech/B.E.)
    Computer Science; Allied Computer Science branches;
    Information Technology; All Circuit branches;
  • Master of Technology/ Engineering (M.Tech/M.E.)/ 5 years integrated course
    Computer Science; Allied Computer Science branches;
    Information Technology;
  • Master Computer Application (MCA)
Responsibilities : Deloitte New Hiring 2024
  • Deliver on specific capability in Technology Consulting
  • Understand business requirements and needs
  • Support technical/functional/process document creation and maintain an effective library
  • Build, test, and deliver solutions
  • Support application design
  • Be responsible for technical specification creation
  • Be responsible for code, development and unit testing
  • Be responsible for test data creation, test scripts creation and execution
  • Support infrastructure-building activities
  • Adhere to defined processes and tools while performing day-to-day operations
General Knowledge : Deloitte New Hiring 2024
  • The candidate will be registered as an Apprentice under the Apprenticeship Act through a tripartite agreement involving the professional, organization and an appropriate government agency
  • The selected candidate will be on a 1-year probation from the joining date
  • Excellent analytical and communication skills (written, verbal, and presentation)
  • Ability to chart one’s career and build networks within the organization
  • Ability to work both independently and as part of a team with professionals at all levels
  • Ability to prioritize tasks and raise concerns/questions where appropriate
  • Interact with the stakeholders on a regular basis through face-to-face interactions/video conferences/teleconferences/emails to understand the global client processes and business problems
  • Suggest practical solutions and collaborate with stakeholders to implement the solution
  • Possess knowledge of methodologies and understanding of process improvement initiatives
  • Interact with Deloitte global clients' functional subject matter specialists
  • Willingness to work in shifts
  • Be quality-focused and demonstrate professionalism
  • Ability to code in any programming language and good working knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

Apply Now

item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Cognizant Off Campus Drive 2024: Cognizant is scheduled to hire for the role of Graduate Trainee (2021,2022,2023 batch) for Service Desk at Bangalore, Chennai & Kolkata. Candidates with the qualification of Any degree are eligible to apply for the job.

Cognizant Off Campus Drive 2024:

Graduate Trainee for Service Desk:

  • 2021,2022,2023 batch of any 3-year Graduation program (UG full time degree).
  • Candidates having 50 % in X, XII, Diploma or UG.
  • Open to Indian nationals only.
  • Being flexible to any work locations, shift timing, technology.
  • The final Cognizant onboarding would be subject to satisfactory background verification.

General Eligibility:

  1. Ensure that both the first name and last name are updated on the PAN card if it is already available.
  2. If the last name is not updated in the PAN card, it is crucial to get it updated to facilitate successful background verification.
  3. Successful background verification relies on matching the PAN card name with the registered name in the superset; discrepancies may hinder the process.
  4. If a PAN card is not available, it is advised not to proceed with the application registration.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Deliver initial technical support and assistance to end-users, addressing their IT-related concerns, and meticulously log and track all support tickets.
  2. Troubleshoot both hardware and software issues, conducting thorough diagnosis, and swiftly resolving technical problems to minimize downtime.
  3. Collaborate with other IT teams to escalate complex issues, ensuring prompt resolution and contribute to maintaining an updated knowledge base for efficient problem-solving.

Role Expectations:

  1. Demonstrate a client-focused approach, interacting with users from diverse communities and cultures worldwide.
  2. Possess impeccable communication skills, both verbal and written, while maintaining a solid technical knowledge base.
  3. Ability to work in shifts and be present in the office.
  4. Uphold a high standard of communication with clients and exhibit sound technical proficiency.

Support Benefits from Cognizant (Post Joining as Full-Time Employee):

  1. Night shift allowance provided by the project.
  2. Cognizant offers cab services for pick-up and drop, prioritizing safety and comfort.
  3. Timely recognition and rewards for outstanding performance.

Apply Now

item.title: Infosys Hiring 2024 | Process Executive | Infosys Jobs In India
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Infosys Hiring 2024 is on the lookout for dynamic individuals to fill the role of Process Executive. If you hold a BCom degree and graduated in the batches of 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, or 2023, this is an excellent opportunity for you. With 0 to 1 year of experience, this role is tailored for those starting their career journey. The salary offered is a competitive 2.4 LPA or more, providing financial stability. This position is available across India, making it accessible to candidates nationwide. The test date will be communicated via email, and the application deadline is not disclosed. Graduates from all branches are eligible to apply. Don't miss the chance to join Infosys in 2024 – apply now for the role of Process Executive!

Infosys Hiring 2024
About Infosys Company: Infosys Hiring 2024

Infosys is a multinational technology consulting and services company headquartered in Bangalore, India. It was founded in 1981 by seven entrepreneurs, led by Narayana Murthy, with an initial investment of just $250. Over the years, the company has grown to become one of the largest IT service providers in the world, with operations in over 50 countries. Infosys offers various services, including software development, maintenance, and consulting. It also provides outsourcing, business process, and infrastructure management services. The company serves clients in various industries, including banking, insurance, healthcare, and manufacturing.

Key Responsibilities: Infosys Hiring 2024
  1. Process Execution: Execute assigned tasks within defined processes, adhering to quality standards and timelines.
  2. Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of processes, workflows, and project-related information.
  3. Quality Assurance: Ensure compliance with quality standards and process guidelines, identifying and addressing any discrepancies or issues.
  4. Collaboration: Work closely with team members, team leads, and other stakeholders to achieve common goals and objectives.
  5. Problem Solving: Identify and troubleshoot issues within the assigned processes, proposing and implementing solutions as needed.
  6. Reporting: Generate and provide regular reports on process metrics, performance, and any relevant key performance indicators (KPIs).
  7. Continuous Improvement: Contribute to process improvement initiatives, suggesting and implementing enhancements to increase efficiency and effectiveness.

Qualifications and Skills: Infosys Hiring 2024

  • Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (business, technology, etc.).
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Attention to detail and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.
  • Familiarity with relevant tools and technologies depending on the specific process.

Experience: Infosys Hiring 2024

  • Entry-level position, but prior relevant experience or internships may be advantageous.

Apply Now

item.title: Accenture Hack Diva 2024 | Hiring Freshers
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Accenture Hack Diva 2024 is seeking vibrant individuals for the role of Hack Diva (Software Engineer). If you hold a qualification in BE/BTech, ME/MTech, MCA, or MSc and are part of the batch of 2024, this is an exceptional opportunity to showcase your skills. No prior experience is required, making it accessible to fresh graduates. The job locations span across prominent cities such as Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, Mumbai, Chennai, Gurgaon, Kolkata, Indore, Jaipur, and Coimbatore, offering a diverse range of options. The test for this engaging opportunity is scheduled for February 11, 2024, and the application deadline is 11:59 PM on February 4, 2024. All branches are eligible, so don't miss out on this unique chance – apply now to become an Accenture Hack Diva in 2024!

Accenture Hack Diva 2024 Details:

The Accenture Hack Diva Hackathon 2024 is a competition exclusively for female candidates, and it focuses on celebrating International Women's Day and promoting gender equality. Here are some key details:

  1. Eligibility: Only female candidates are eligible to participate, and it is an individual competition.
  2. Theme: The event celebrates women living boldly without limits and aims to support gender equality, emphasizing limitless opportunities for women to thrive.
  3. Culture of Equality: Accenture is committed to creating a culture of equality, fostering an environment that attracts, develops, and rewards top talent. They aim to achieve a gender-balanced workforce by 2025.
  4. Selection Process: Accenture Hack Diva 2024
  • Round 1 - Qualifier: A 90-minute eliminator round with challenging coding assessments. Participants can choose their preferred programming language.
  • Round 2 - Semifinals: A 120-minute coding contest with intricate coding scenarios. Only the best performers from the qualifier round advance.
  • Round 3 - Finals: The final round where finalists compete in a 120-minute challenging coding contest.

Benefits & Rewards: Accenture Hack Diva 2024

  • The winner gets an opportunity to work for Accenture.
  • Exciting rewards are offered to the winner.

Overall, the Hackathon aims to showcase the skills and innovation of female participants in the field of coding, with a focus on promoting gender equality in the tech industry.

Double Click To Apply Now

item.title: Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023 | 2 Roles Only For BCA & BSC
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023 - Amdocs Is Hiring For 2 Roles Only From BCA & BSC 2023 Batch And The Roles Are Associate Technical & Business Operations Analyst, All The Details Are Given Below.

Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023 - Summery
Who are we? - Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023

If you’re a smartphone user then you are part of an ever more connected and digital world. At Amdocs, we are leading the digital revolution into the future. From virtualized telecommunications networks, Big Data and Internet of Things to mobile financial services, billing and operational support systems, we are continually evolving our business to help you become more connected. We make sure that when you watch a video on YouTube, message friends on Snapchat or send your images on Instagram, you get great service anytime, anywhere, and on any device. We are at the heart of the telecommunications industry working with giants such as AT&T, Vodafone, Telstra and Telefonica, helping them create an amazing new world for you where technology is being used in amazing new ways every single day.  

In one sentence - Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023

The role involves handling incidents and service requests from customers/end-users by following the standard methods and procedures of the unit.

What will your job look like?
  • You will perform ticket analysis, service interruption analysis, triaging of issues, and follow-up with relevant teams for resolution.
  • You will ensure that all required ticket information is available for further analysis (for example, screenshot of error and customer ID) and run methods and procedures to provide resolution to known/recurring issues.
  • You will apply your skills to effectively use the existing knowledge base and documentation for quick-win and first-level resolution. 
  • You will perform queue management for assigning tickets to other teams and follow up for timely resolution while keeping track of SLAs. 
  • You will ensure timely resolution or escalation within the agreed SLA. This includes creating a positive customer support experience and building strong relationships through understanding the problem, communicating promptly on progress, and handling customers with a professional attitude. 
  • You will update checklists for quality assurance and progress tracking, following standard operating procedures.
  • You will have to work in various shifts on rotation basis
  • You will ensure the seamless handover between shifts and monitor and publish the SLA achievement by keeping track of all KPIs. 
  • You will ensure crystal clear communication and documentation as a point of contact. 
  • You will perform validation, verification, and correction, wherever applicable, of artifacts of the system (reports, bills, event records, screens, and so on). You will report and properly document any errors that are detected. 
  • You will perform basic software system operations, using the online screen, running maps and jobs, basic configuration/installation, and taking backups.
  • You will work on fallouts from various applications, journalize manual billing requests, process payments, and customize miscellaneous activities.
  • You will work on health check, monitoring of system and sending regular reports.
     
All you need is... Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023
  • BCA ,BSc, BBA, MSc  ( Computer Application /Computer Science /IT) - 2023 Graduates (Fulltime)
  • Minimum -60%in academics (No backlogs /Breaks)
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to respond to customer queries quickly
  • Good Analytical skills and hands-on technical knowledge of Unix & SQL.
  • Ability to understand business needs and manage 24X7 shifts.
  • Experience in working ambiguous situations, working under pressure and flexible work hours.
  • Understanding of Production Support/Application Support
  • Job Location : Gurgaon
     
Why you will love this job: Amdocs Hiring Drive 2023
  • You will get to show off your fine-tuned skills for resolving issues and helping the end-user.
  • You will be a key member of a global, dynamic and highly collaborative team with various possibilities for personal and professional development.
  • You will have the opportunity to work in a multinational environment for the global market leader in its field.

Apply Now

item.title: L&T Off Campus drive 2023 Multiple Roles for Freshers
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
L&T Off Campus Drive 2023 is currently offering opportunities for Diploma Engineer Trainees (DET), Graduate Engineer Trainees (GET), and Post Graduate Engineer Trainees (PGET). If you hold a diploma, BE, BTech, or ME/MTech qualification and belong to the batch of 2023, this is an excellent chance to kickstart your career with L&T. Experience is not required, making it accessible for fresh graduates. The salary for these trainee positions ranges from 3 to 4 LPA, providing a competitive compensation package. These roles are available across India, making it a pan-India opportunity. The test date will be communicated via email, and the application deadline is 2nd February 2024 (12:00 PM). Don't miss out on this chance to be part of L&T – apply now for the Off Campus Drive in 2023!

L&T Off Campus Drive 2023
About Larsen and Toubro Company:

Larsen & Toubro (L&T) is a prominent multinational conglomerate headquartered in Mumbai, India. Established in 1938, L&T has grown to become one of the largest and most respected engineering and construction companies in India. The company operates in various sectors, including engineering, procurement, construction (EPC), information technology, financial services, and more.

While L&T is headquartered in India, the company has a significant global footprint with operations in multiple countries. It has undertaken projects and collaborations worldwide, contributing to its status as an international player in the engineering and construction industry. L&T is listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange (NSE), reflecting its standing as a publicly traded company.

L&T Off Campus Drive 2023

L&T Technology Services is conducting an Off-Campus drive in 2023, specifically targeting candidates who will be graduating in that year. The eligibility criteria include candidates with a Diploma, BE, BTech, ME/MTech degree from any branch. A minimum academic requirement of 60% is essential, while there is no specified age limit. Importantly, there is no bond associated with this opportunity, providing flexibility for interested candidates.

Apply Now

item.title: Deloitte OTN Hiring 2024 | College Freshers
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Deloitte OTN Hiring 2024 is currently offering positions for Analyst Trainees. If you hold a BE or BTech qualification and belong to the batch of 2023, this is a fantastic opportunity to join Deloitte. No prior experience is required, making it accessible for fresh graduates. The stipend for this trainee position is INR 4.5 Lakh per annum, providing a competitive compensation package. The job location spans across India, offering opportunities nationwide. The test date will be communicated via email, and the application deadline has not been disclosed. Graduates from branches such as Cyber Security, Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering, EEE, ECE, EIE, and other circuital branches are encouraged to apply. Don't miss out on this opportunity – apply now for Deloitte OTN Hiring in 2024!

Deloitte OTN Hiring 2024
Experiences at Deloitte: Deloitte OTN Hiring 2024
  1. Improving Operational Performance: Dive into the world of enhancing operational efficiency by analyzing clients' IT controls and processes across security and risk management operations.
  2. Data Privacy and Security Controls: Support live applications related to data privacy and security controls, ensuring the highest standards are maintained.
  3. Managed Services Programs: Engage in providing managed services programs through ITIL-aligned processes, sustaining secure and available mission-critical systems, and addressing software vulnerabilities.
  4. Smart Device Monitoring: Establish methods for monitoring "smart" devices connected to enterprise networks, contributing to a secure and connected environment.
  5. Security Analytics and Incident Response: Perform continuous monitoring and security analytics as part of the Security Operations Center (SOC). Handle incident response support, troubleshoot, and simplify complex technical issues for clients.
  6. Technology Solutions Integration: Integrate business needs and technology solutions, from developing system requirements to implementation, ensuring a seamless alignment between technology and business objectives.
  7. Forensic Accounting Support: Assist forensic accountants in detecting and measuring fraud or other violations, showcasing the intersection of technology and financial expertise.
  8. Data Mining and Predictive Modeling: Query and mine large datasets to discover patterns, using predictive modeling capabilities to assess and address client issues.
  9. Controls Effectiveness Assessment: Assess clients' controls effectiveness, ensuring a high degree of reliability in external financial reporting, compliance with regulations, and safeguarding mission-critical assets.

The Team: Deloitte Risk and Financial Services is comprised of strategic thinkers and technology specialists committed to managing critical and complex business solutions. The team focuses on deploying and maintaining solutions that address and manage risks, combining data analysis, statistical modeling, and rules-based methods to provide insights in the forensic and transaction domains.

Qualifications Required: Deloitte OTN Hiring 2024

  • Bachelor's degree in Cyber Security, Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering, EEE, ECE, EIE, or related circuital branches.
  • Graduating in 2023 with a CGPA of 60% or equivalent and no standing backlog/arrears.
  • No previous assessment by Deloitte in the past six months.

Preferred Qualities: Deloitte OTN Hiring 2024

  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills for effective global collaboration.
  • Strong sense of ownership, attention to detail, and process adherence.
  • Customer-centric approach with the ability to solve issues impactfully.
  • Moderate analytical and problem-solving skills for continuous improvement.
  • Programming skills in C, C++, Java, Python, relational databases, networking concepts, and SQL.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
  • Good grasp of cybersecurity and risk domains, with a profound curiosity and agility.

Apply Now

item.title: Cognizant Hiring Freshers | Engineer Trainee Role | All Details
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Cognizant Hiring Freshers: Exciting opportunities await as Cognizant is looking for Engineer Trainees. If you're a 2023 batch BE/BTech graduate, this is a great chance to start your career. Experience is not required, making it accessible to freshers. Cognizant offers a competitive salary of 4 LPA. The job locations include Bengaluru, Chennai, and Kolkata, providing a choice of vibrant cities. The last date to apply is 20 February 2024 at 12:00 AM. Don't miss out on this opportunity – apply now to kickstart your career with Cognizant!

Cognizant Hiring Freshers : All Details
 
Job title : Cognizant Hiring Freshers

IT Service Desk is a centralized team that provides technical support to our clients, including troubleshooting and resolution of IT issues and ensuring smooth functioning of their Computer Systems and IT Services. As many as 90 global clients across different continents are supported by 15,000 strong Service Desk team, across the globe. The landscape of IT Service Desk has witnessed significant transformations due to technological advancements. Today, many organizations leverage AI chat bots to automate and streamline their support processes. AI chat bots use natural language processing to provide instant responses to common user queries and handle simple tasks, reducing the workload on human analysts. Robotic Process Automation (RPA) is also gaining traction, allowing repetitive and rule-based tasks to be automated, freeing up analysts' time for more complex issues.

Location

Bengaluru, Chennai, Kolkata. Candidate must be flexible to relocate to any of these locations as per the business requirement & demand.

Eligibility Cognizant Hiring Freshers

  • 2023 Batch of B.E/B.Tech of any branch (UG full time degree).
  • Candidates having 50 % in X, XII or Diploma, UG.
  • Open to Indian nationals only.
  • Being flexible to any work locations, shift timing, technology.
  • The final Cognizant onboarding would be subject to satisfactory background verification.
  • If PAN card is already available, ensure you have both first name and last name updated in the PAN card. If you do not have your last name updated in the PAN card kindly get it updated. Background verification will not be successful if last name is not updated in the PAN card. Background verification will not be successful if the PAN card name and the superset registered name is not matching. If PAN card is not available, kindly do not proceed with the application registration
Key responsibilities : Cognizant Hiring Freshers
  • Provide first-line technical support and assistance to end-users, addressing their IT-related issues and enquiries, log and track all support tickets, ensuring accurate documentation and timely resolution of problems.
  • Troubleshoot hardware and software problems, performing diagnosis and resolving technical issues to minimize downtime, collaborate with other IT teams to escalate complex issues and ensure prompt resolution and to maintain knowledge base articles and documentation to enhance self-service options and facilitate efficient problem-solving.

Role expectations - Cognizant Hiring Freshers

  • Associate should be client focused and able to work with users from different communities and cultures across the globe.
  • Ability to have flawless communication (verbal and written) with our clients and possess sound technical knowledge.
  • Work in shifts and work from office.
Support available from Cognizant (post joining as Full Time Employee)
  • Night shift allowance will be paid by the project.
  • Cognizant provide cabs for pick-up and drop, ensuring safety and comfort.
  • Timely rewards and recognition for top performers.

If you are passionate about customer service, possess strong technical skills, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, then this role is for you. 

Please note, if selected, you will join as a fresher as no prior work experience will be considered.

Compensation Engineer Trainee -    4,00,000 LPA

 

Apply Now

Innovaccer Apprenticeship Hiring 2024 presents an exciting opportunity for the role of Apprentice – Data Engineer. If you hold a qualification in BE, BTech, or ME/MTech and graduated in the batches of 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, or 2023, this is your chance to embark on a rewarding career journey.

Technical Skills Required - Innovaccer Apprenticeship Hiring 2024
  • Basic understanglading of data modeling concepts.
  • Exposure to SQL and the ability to write simple queries.
  • Eagerness to learn and work with Python libraries, such as Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-Learn.

  • Collaborate with the data services team to manipulate and transform healthcare data effectively.

item.title: Accenture Mega Hiring Freshers 2024 | BCA MCA & Engineering | All Details
item.dc:creator: ojwjql
item.content:encoded:
Accenture Mega Hiring Freshers 2024 campaign offers three distinct roles for recent graduates. The first role is System & Application Services Associate-Grads, open to M.C.M, M.Sc, M.A, M.Com, M.FA, B.Sc., BCA, BBA, B.A, B.Com, BBA, B.Voc, and BMS graduates from 2019 to 2023 batches, requiring 0-11 months of experience, offering a salary of Rs 3,44,700, and providing job locations in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, Mumbai, Chennai, Gurgaon, Kolkata, Indore, Jaipur, and Coimbatore. The second and third roles are both Application Development Associates, available to BE/BTECH/ME/MTECH/MCA and M.Sc graduates from the same batches, with similar experience and salary ranges, and job locations in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Mumbai, Pune, Gurgaon, and Kolkata. The test dates for all roles will be communicated via email, and the last application dates are not disclosed, welcoming graduates from any branch to apply.

Role 1: System & Application Services Associate-Grads
Role 2: Application Development Associate
Role 3: Packaged Application Development Associate
SASA Role Details : Accenture Mega Hiring Freshers 2024

OLE #1: PROGRAM SUPPORT (PROGRAM CONTROL SERVICES)

Key Responsibilities:

  • Reporting support
  • Process support
  • Service management
  • Run support

Knowledge and Skill Requirements: Accenture Mega Hiring Freshers 2024

  • Good communication skills
  • Co-ordination and follow-up with various stakeholders
  • Preparing MIS reports and publishing it as per the SLA
  • Resource Management (onboarding and Offboarding)
  • Demand creation on demand and supply tool
  • Administrative/Operations  Support
  • Service Management/tooling support
  • Assets and Artefacts management
  • Knowledge on MS Office - Excel, Word
  • Ability to learn and perform quickly

Apply Link SASA

PADA Role Details : Accenture Mega Hiring Freshers 2024

What would you do? 

As an Associate Software Engineer you would largely be involved in:

  • Design, build, test, assemble, support and configure application using business requirements
  • Understand business drivers that will impact performance and deliver software to those expectations
  • Bake technology trends into solutions; Participate in the development of automation solutions, new functionality and technologies and integrate them in existing solutions
  • Responsible for incident resolution and support extended to customers through voice interaction/email/chat/remote support

What we need?
